sectionedDescription/description:
Relax with the whole family at this Brand new Cabin.  A very peaceful place to stay. Sits on the Guyandotte River that's great for kayaking.   Very close to the Hatfield McCoy Bear Wallow trailhead.   Unload your ATV and hit the trail.  Restaurant on site and also very close to a car wash.  If you need a place to stay for the holidays while visiting family, this is the place for you!

We have 3 separate bedrooms.  In 2 of the bedrooms there are queen size bed.   In the other bedroom we have 2 full size beds.  We have 1 bathroom with a shower and a laundry area  a washer and dryer

I live just a few minutes from the cabin.  I’m easy to get in touch with should any problem occur

There's a Tudor's Biscuit World Restaurant on site.  Other restaurants nearby.  Also Chief Logan state park is just a couple of miles down the road.  There is a Carwash close by

Bearwallow is a fun trail. Small but worth a good ride. There is a hill climb on 35, a
Coal mine on 36, a Collapsed coal mine on 86.  83 is a fun,  but more technical trail that has a deep mud pit on it. 
27 has two decent mud holes right in the middle of a wide open area. 
28 is nothing but mud.

Nice fire pit with benches.  Please bring your own firewood.  Also have a corn  hole game on-site.

We do not permit any type of partying or loud music.


*We are also just a couple of of miles from chief Logan State Park.  In the month of December they have “Christmas in the Park” light display.  Best in the state! 

No smoking is permitted inside of cabin

sectionedDescription/access: There is parking for 4 trucks and trailers (20') at the house. If trailer is larger than 20' parking is available on our property across street, under the bridge. You can also text John for more details.
sectionedDescription/description:
Located in the heart of the Hatfield McCoy Trail System

HMT Rentals has direct trail access, we are  located in downtown Man, WV, less than one mile  from the Rockhouse Trailhead of the Hatfield McCoy Trail System.

Check-In to our unit, drop your trailer, unload your machines and ride your ATV, UTV or Motorcycle directly to one of the local businesses in the Town of Man. Businesses include (Gas, Food, Bar and Grill, Sporting Goods!!)

There is parking for 4 trucks and trailers (20') at the house. If trailer is larger than 20' parking is available on our property across street, under the bridge. You can also text John for more details.

Ride your machine through town to access the Hatfield McCoy Trail. Access Rockhouse Trail, Devil Anse Trail and Buffalo Mountain Trail. Also, ride your machine into town to eat at one of our many restaurants.

primaryHost/about: I am a retired woman excited about being an AIRBNB host. I collect all things pineapple related. I also enjoy crafting and shopping. My loves live in Florida who call me “NaNa”. Welcome to my imperfectly perfect world! I live in the Pineapple Home so, I can’t wait to meet and greet everyone!!!
sectionedDescription/access: Shared areas are the den/TV. Kitchen which has the use of kcup coffee maker and toaster.And use of the electric stove and microwave.
sectionedDescription/description:
I live in a very nice subdivision, a very safe and family friendly area. My home is a one story house. You may park your car in front of the house in the blacktop to the left of the sidewalk.. facing the porch! 

While staying in my home, which I also live in, I will be available, but will respect your space and privacy.  I love talking with and meeting new people.

One queen size bed, a desk and closet space. Very nice private bathroom with shower in the bedroom. Apt size refrigerator in the bedroom for your use.

Shared areas are the den/TV. Kitchen which has the use of kcup coffee maker and toaster.And use of the electric stove and microwave.

I live here in my home so I will be available to greet you and answer any questions. But you will have your privacy.

The Map is WRONG the location of my house is coming up the hill and staying up to the right on Village Drive!   Riverwalk has a Kroger , T.J.MAXX, and several restaurants. Dunbar also has a Kroger and popular restaurants!   Corridor G where most shopping  and popular restaurants are located.                                                       8 miles or 20 minutes to drive to University of Charleston.                   1.6 miles or 6 minutes to drive to Thomas Hospital.                                  2.2 miles to Shawnee Sports Complex at Dunbar, Salango Way. Downtown Charleston is 15 minute drive

Park in front of the house in the blacktop that is to the left of the sidewalk facing the porch

Very easy access to Interstates 64&74& 77. Minutes to Thomas Memorial Hospital using Kanawha Turnpike.  Downtown South Charleston has many restaurants and a Antique Mall. My favorite restaurant in South Charleston is Olive Tree , Cafe  Appalachia, Happy Days & for the “sweets” Spring Hill Bakery their famous “hot dogs”. Elephant Thia is an excellent restaurant also. Downtown Charleston; Pies & Pints, Taylor Books and visit our Charleston Market!

additionalHouseRules:
Hi, thanks for booking!

Please read and agree to the these simple guidelines we request:

- If possible, send us an estimated time of arrival so we can plan for it. We just want to be available in case you need anything.

- If you are going to bring pets (we LOVE furbabies) -please, no more than 2 animals. Also, if your animal has aggression issues or another behavioural issue, advise us in advance so we can keep our own pups safe! 

Thank you!

primaryHost/about:
I've lived in WV all my life and am married with 2 grown children. 
My favorite band is the Eagles.
sectionedDescription/access:
This is a 1-bedroom small house with a private, keyless entrance.  The passcode is sent after booking.
You will have a driveway to park in which is set at an incline, so be prepared as you are pulling in!
The road is sometimes busy as you pull in but we have not had any issues.
sectionedDescription/description:
Welcome & thank you for checking out our place!  
We are within short driving distance to: Marshall University, Cabell Huntington Hospital or St. Mary's, the Huntington Mall The place is small, quaint and cozy, offers a full kitchen, comfy bed, we live close to a highway so there is some traffic and our driveway is at a incline we are in a protected area which is near the city and on a bus line.  
Also, our Wi-Fi is FAST!! 
Stay with us; voted the most desired AirBnB in Huntington in 2018!

This cute small house is perfect for overnight or a few days. It is a full 4 room apartment/small house above the garage. It used to be an rental space and now it's returned as an AirBnB. You have your own little apartment-style space - it is NOT shared with anyone.

Additionally, the yard is completely fenced in for your pet, we have 2 dogs here already!  The space is entirely yours, and protected as part of the backyard of our property but with it's own personal area.

This is a 1-bedroom small house with a private, keyless entrance.  The passcode is sent after booking.
You will have a driveway to park in which is set at an incline, so be prepared as you are pulling in!
The road is sometimes busy as you pull in but we have not had any issues.

I live in the main house and we are happy to help.

The houses are not on top of each other and there's a large backyard. There is a 2 lane road out front, and the river on the other side of the guard rail. Great view but no river access.

This location is heavily car-dependent with a bus coming by 3 times daily.

We have dogs, as does the neighbor. If you are uncomfortable around dogs this may not be the AirBnB for you.  Please be careful to close the gate as you are coming and going. 
Additionally, our neighbor raises chickens, ducks, quail and a host of other animals but they are just in the neighboring yard so they shouldn't be of any concern.

Also, our Wi-Fi is FAST!! 
Stay with us; voted the most desired AirBnB in Huntington in 2018!
sectionedDescription/transit: This location is heavily car-dependent with a bus coming by 3 times daily.

photos/3/caption: TV and Internet are included
photos/11/caption: Wonderful bed with a mattress that is the perfect blend between firm and comfortable.
primaryHost/about: Bill joined the AirB&B family in 2018 when his daughter thought he might enjoy listing one of his furnished apartments for short-term rental. The two of them had so much fun setting up the space for travelers that he has kept it going. Bill loves traveling and has been to various points around the USA, but nothing compares to his time spent in Uganda, East Africa (though he still claims West Virginia beats all!). He and his wife Cecilia have been married for over 50 years and have three grown children. His oldest daughter Angela rents her Farm House and Barn Loft on Airbnb, his youngest daughter Cara works as a nurse at CAMC, and his son Keith has been a missionary in Uganda. He has 18 grandchildren and0 he welcomes you to visit his Coal River Hideaways!
rootAmenitySections/1/subtitle: The host hasn't reported a carbon monoxide detector on the property.
sectionedDescription/access:
You have access to the entire apartment. Queen size bed and full size futon in bedroom.We want you to know that we’re doing our part to
help our Airbnb guests stay safe by cleaning and
disinfecting frequently touched surfaces (light
switches, doorknobs, cabinet handles, remotes, etc.)
before you check in.
sectionedDescription/description:
Coal River Hideaway has every thing you need for work or play. This fully furnished apartment is close to the metro Charleston area plus conveniently located near Coal River for kayaking. Guests have access to clean towels, a full kitchen,  wireless internet, TV, and washer and dryer. So if its for an extended stay with work, visiting family in the St. Albans area, or looking for a launching place for site-seeing the beautiful state of West Virginia, this is a very affordable place to stay.

This is a great place to consider for long term work assignments or other long term stays. In the bedroom is a Queen size bed and futon for sleeping (Air B and B describes it as a couch/bed but its a futon). There is a one time $35 cleaning fee so if multiple nights are booked the cleaning fee is still $35. Please no pets. Mr. McFarland has a strict no pet policy.

You have access to the entire apartment. Queen size bed and full size futon in bedroom.We want you to know that we’re doing our part to
help our Airbnb guests stay safe by cleaning and
disinfecting frequently touched surfaces (light
switches, doorknobs, cabinet handles, remotes, etc.)
before you check in.

A lock box will be provided to access the apartment.  Depending on the length of stay-the guest may or may not interact with the owner.

This apparment is located on Shadyside  Road right before you have the choice to go through the tunnel to River Bend. Sunday Stables, and the Coal River Group, or the choice to go up the hill to Lower Falls, or the choice to turn right into River Lake Estates.

There is no public transportation available.

Down the street to the right a fishing lake, play ground, and pretty neighborhood roads are available for walking, running, or biking. A Dollar Store is available for purchasing pantry items and other necessities.

sectionedDescription/description:
Almost Heaven Lodging is a place the whole family can enjoy. Conveniently located straight across from Buffalo Mountain Trail 14, You can fill your day with trail riding or hiking in our beautiful mountains.
         The property has a large parking lot to accommodate your ATVs with room to spare.
        You can kick back and relax in the covered outdoor picnic area, while the kids have a blast on the playground, or wading and fishing in the creek.

Almost Heaven Lodging is a very quiet. Has a large parking lot. Covered picnic area to enjoy. It has a three bedroom large living  and kitchen, and laundry in house

primaryHost/about: Local who rides the Hatfield McCoy Trails and who takes great pride in clean, affordable lodging. We are working hard to promote the Hatfield McCoy Trails while helping our local economy.
sectionedDescription/access: Full Kitchen, Fire Pit, and Washer & Dryer
sectionedDescription/description:
This home was recently flipped and completely restored. It is one of the first homes in Williamson and is full of history. We cannot wait to host you. Trail riders, marathon runners, business people, or stopping by for vacation, we got you covered. The house is complete with two full baths, three bedrooms, living and dining room, kitchen, fire pit, and much more. We also offer a garage ($25 per machine per stay) to house your toys. Clean. Fun. Lodging.

Living Room, 3 Bedrooms, 2 Baths, and Plenty of Parking.

Full Kitchen, Fire Pit, and Washer & Dryer

We are usually around and always available by call or text.

Close to food, bars, and the Hatfield McCoy Trails.

You can park, unload, and ride your machine to the trails. Also, you can walk, bike, or drive.

Need anything? Just message us.

sectionedDescription/description:
We are located in downtown Pikeville, within a very short walk to Pikeville Medical Center and UPike. Enjoy the conveniences of a full kitchen and a quiet area where you can expect a peaceful night's sleep on a quality mattress.  There is one queen bed and also a twin rollout bed. Street parking is available in front of the house only. (Please don’t park in the driveway or block it.) We have door code entry so there's no need to hassle with keys.  We have a smartTV (no cable) and free Wifi.

sectionedDescription/description:
3 bedroom suite with private living and dining room. We are located in downtown Williamson, WV and within 0.5 miles of the entrance to the Hatfield McCoy Trails. 2 full bathrooms and plenty of parking. Join us for first class accommodations for trail riders, marathon runners, business trips, or vacation. We also offer a detached garage that will hold up to 4 SXS or ATVs for $25 per machine per stay.

Close to restaurants and bars.

sectionedDescription/description:
You won’t forget the peaceful surroundings of this rustic destination.

This cottage is at a campground that serves trail riders.  It is quiet thru the week and then comes to life on the weekends.  Come get familiar with WV culture.

The guests will have the whole cottage to themselves.

Please contact me through Airbnb platform.

The campground is peaceful and there is low lighting for star gazing.

The campground has many campers that ride ATV's and keep trails.  The cottage is close to town and perfect for couples.

additionalHouseRules:
Must be 23 or older to book unless you contact host for preapproval.  
Absolutely no booking for anyone other than yourself. This is against airbnb policy. 
No parties and no extra guests unless pre-approved by host.

 No Smoking or vaping. No use of illegal drugs. NO 420. 

Cottage quiet time is from 10pm - 6am. For the comfort of all guests please limit kitchen use, showering (showering when arriving from a late check in or if work hours involve you getting back late is permissible just please be courteous of other guests who are sleeping) and loud noise during these hours. 

Hand wash and put always all used dishes directly after use. No dishes are allowed to remain dirty in the sink overnight. 

The cottage is environmentally friendly and I ask that you try to reuse bath towels. There are hooks for used towels in the bathroom and on the closet door of each room. 
Place used towels and washcloths that need laundered in laundry basket in hall. 

Please use vent fan in bathroom during showers to allow moisture to escape and prevent mildew buildup.

Lower level deck and lower area of the cottage are both off limits to guests. 

No overnight guests permitted. No visiting guests allowed. This can cause a safety issue with other guests since they are not registered.  

$10 fee for lost bedroom key 
$25 fee for ruined  or stained sheets 
$50 fee for ruined or stained  comforter

photos/2/caption: The cottage roses in bloom.
photos/6/caption: The cottage was built by a stone mason for he and his wife. He was quite an artistic individual who loved carving stone.
photos/7/caption: The cottage is your own personal tree house. Nestled in the hills of WV but only 2 miles from downtown and major shopping areas.
photos/13/caption: The cottage is ready for Valentines Day
photos/16/caption: The Senators Room- The largest room in the cottage. Perfect for a busy professional.  Room is complete with a queen size bed, desk, executive chair, side table, 2 lamps, and wireless charging alarm clock.
photos/18/caption:

This cozy room has a view of the side and back garden. Queen bed with dresser, small desk area and closet. With a ceiling fan, stand fan, and  lamp
photos/19/caption: The Bridge Room- My favorite room in the house. Large double windows provide an amazing view of the scenic bridge and back yard foliage. Hardwood floors, area rug, antique dresser, lamp, closet, desk, i-home charging station, stand fan and closet.

primaryHost/about: Hello. my name is Rebecca. I worked in the medical field for many years and now work for the state of WV and own an Aerial Yoga studio. In my spare time I volunteer for a disaster relief organization and am a certified chainsaw operator.  I have a passion for travel and love the outdoors. My goal for my airbnb is to make everyone feel at home in the "cottage away from home."
sectionedDescription/access: Feel free to use the side porch, lighted deck area and outdoor gas grill during your stay.
sectionedDescription/description:
Cozy South Hills cottage in a premium location in Charleston, WV excellent for medical professionals. Safe & quiet area 1.2m to downtown Charleston Capitol Street area. 2.1m to CAMC General. 4.5m to CAMC Memorial. 3.6m to CAMC Women's & Children's. 7.4m to Thomas Memorial. 4.7m to DOW Chemical. 6.2m to CRW. Private Bedroom, queen bed, dresser, desk, Hardwood floors. Spacious shared kitchen, living room & bathroom. Bedroom with keyed lock. Smoke & Pet Free. Long term stays welcome.  23+ to book

Linens, towels and washcloths are provided. All kitchen utensils are provided. There is a gas grill  and patio furniture located on the upper deck available for use. Corn hole set available and 6 inflatable inner tubes free for use to float down the beautiful Elk River. This is a quiet, cozy, peaceful cottage built by a stone mason in the hillside and is sure to make your stay in Charleston enjoyable and relaxing.  Please be aware the common areas (bathroom, kitchen, living room, dining room, and patio) of the cottage are shared between all 3 airbnb rooms and myself.

Feel free to use the side porch, lighted deck area and outdoor gas grill during your stay.

Guests may reach me via text, email or calls. I will be on the premises throughout the day if you have any questions.

0.7 - 0.8 mile walk to Bridge Road shops. Including:
Lola's Pizza, 
Bridge Road Bistro,
Bridge Mart and Deli,
Rite Aid, 
Hudson's Pizza

Also a short walk to connect to the Carriage Trail walking trail.

Uber and Lyft available but highly unreliable. Bus transportation not available. Please be sure to have access to a vehicle during your stay as walking to downtown is not possible due to no sidewalks and a curvy road.

Cottage quiet time is from 10pm - 6am. For the comfort of all guests please limit kitchen use and loud noise during these hours.
 No smoking or vaping  anywhere on property. No pets due to host allergies. No overnight guests permitted.

name: Spacious 3 bedroom cabin with hot tub
photos/47/caption: Lots of parking! Parking pad is well over 100’ and 25’ wide.
photos/49/caption: Full view of parking area. There is roughly 15’ unpaved area (closest to you) for trailer parking if needed. Also plenty of grass to pull up if you need to turn around with a trailer.
sectionedDescription/access: There is plenty of parking on the premises, Probably 6-8 cars could comfortably park at the cabin itself on the flat parking pad. Any additional vehicles could park in the driveway itself. The driveway was just paved with asphalt, so any vehicle can access the cabin. GPS will get you to the cabin and also help navigate to any attractions you want to see/do! There is a keypad lock for self check in and check out.
sectionedDescription/description:
Located in Paintsville, Kentucky.  Gather around the wood fireplace and enjoy a game of pool. There are 2 smart tv's to  binge your favorite shows on. Or unplug and and take in the sights on the wrap around porch with a good book. Enjoy the outdoor kitchen and firepit, then hop  in the 8-person hot tub. located just 5 minutes from hiking trails, Paintsville lake state park and golf course, and local eateries . Walmart is conveniently only 8 minutes away.

This cabin is 3000 square feet, and has plenty of room to spread out. the porch has several rocking chairs, a porch swing and an outdoor dining table and chairs. There is a fire pit outside, near the out door kitchen and sectional. There is a large hot tub, with Bluetooth speakers and lights. The porch has lighting and fans for evening comfort and plenty of seating. The property is secluded on 15 acres, with a view of the mountains. There is a custom pool table also in the living room. There are 4 couches and a recliner in the house.  The master bathroom has heated floors, and a custom walk-in shower with body jets and a bench seat. There are 2 bathtub/shower combos great for small children. Washer and dryer on site in case any laundry needs to be done while on vacation. Complementary soap and shampoos are provided.

There is plenty of parking on the premises, Probably 6-8 cars could comfortably park at the cabin itself on the flat parking pad. Any additional vehicles could park in the driveway itself. The driveway was just paved with asphalt, so any vehicle can access the cabin. GPS will get you to the cabin and also help navigate to any attractions you want to see/do! There is a keypad lock for self check in and check out.

There is a paved road right up to the driveway, so getting around is a breeze. The gps can get you to any attractions you may want to visit!

There are some neighbors a few hundred yards away, so please be mindful of that in the late evenings to not make too much noise outside. 
Guests are encouraged to bring sandals for getting to and from the hot tub, so it stays clean and usable for other guests. Also if hiking is something you want to do, don't forget to bring a backpack!
sectionedDescription/name: Spacious 3 bedroom cabin with hot tub

additionalHouseRules:
No smoking, including vapes. This also includes Cannabis, you can do that outside at your own risk.

No Parties or Events and please be considerate to our neighbors keeping all noise to a minimum after 9:00 pm.

Please no eating or drinking in the bed.

No unregistered guests

No Pets

No shoes on the bed or the furniture.

No rearranging of the furniture.

Please leave the kitchen as you find it.  Please wash, dry, and put away any dishes used. Do not cut anything or put hot pans on countertops. 
There is a cutting board provided and pot holders for hot items. 

Please do not wash our towels with your clothes.  

Please do not wash our sheets with any towels.

Please check all cabinets, refrigerators, dressers, and microwaves for items you may have left behind.

Books and games are provided as a courtesy. They were acquired for your enjoyment. Please leave them for the next guests.

Please remove all trash at the end of your stay and place in in the dumpster at the end of the driveway.

Please place all wet towels and washcloths in the tub at the end of your stay.

Please do not strip the bed, we will take care of that when we clean. 

 If you use one of the extra blankets, please leave it out so that we know it needs to be laundered.

Guest agrees to pay any and all damages incurred by their stay.

Check-out is at 11:00 am. If you need a later check-out, please contact us at least one hour prior to see if this can be accommodated. As a courtesy, please message us upon exit

There are probably about 15 million more things we should say to the general public about how to act when you are away from home, but basically, don’t be an a-hole.

primaryHost/about: I have traveled all over the country and abroad, but I am extra passionate about my home state, West- by -God Virginia!  Since I’ve traveled extensively, I understand the things that can make life easier while on the road. sectionedDescription/access: Our place is conveniently located just off of I-64 in Cross Lanes, WV.   We are only 1 mile from the Mardi Gras Casino in a quiet neighborhood. Private access to the unit and free parking right out front.
sectionedDescription/description:
Have you ever wondered what it would be like to stay overnight in a mini-storage?  Probably not, lol!  But if you've ever watched HGTV, you'll see that people across the country are creating short-term rentals out of all kinds of crazy things, from shipping containers and barns,  to old warehouses.  Well, in Cross Lanes WV, we took our cues from those folks on TV and created a short-term rental out of a storage unit!  Conveniently located, just off I64,  and only 1 mile to the Mardi Gras Casino.

As you’ll see in the pictures, this is not your run-of-the-mill storage unit. We’ve got everything you’ll need for a comfortable stay including a full kitchen, full bathroom and laundry, full-size bed, dresser, separate sitting area, Wi-Fi, smart TV, and multiple eating areas, etc. This unit is fully furnished, stocked, and thoughtfully decorated

Our place is conveniently located just off of I-64 in Cross Lanes, WV.   We are only 1 mile from the Mardi Gras Casino in a quiet neighborhood. Private access to the unit and free parking right out front.

Please feel free to reach out with any questions!

We are located in a quiet residential neighborhood and in a private setting.

Conveniently located just 3/4 of a mile off of I-64 in Cross Lanes WV,  and  around the corner to shopping and restaurants, we are only 1 mile to the Mardi Gras Casino and 3.4 miles to West Virginia State University.  We are 13 minutes to downtown Charleston, 20 minutes to the Yeager Airport and just 45 minutes to Huntington and Marshall University.

Prior to arrival, you will be provided with a door code that is unique to your stay.

We’ve got everything you’ll need for a comfortable stay including a full kitchen, full bathroom and laundry, full-size bed, dresser, separate sitting area, Wi-Fi, smart TV, and multiple eating areas, etc. This unit is fully furnished, stocked, and thoughtfully decorated
sectionedDescription/summary: Have you ever wondered what it would be like to stay overnight in a mini-storage?  Probably not, lol!  But if you've ever watched HGTV, you'll see that people across the country are creating short-term rentals out of all kinds of crazy things, from shipping containers and barns,  to old warehouses.  Well, in Cross Lanes WV, we took our cues from those folks on TV and created a short-term rental out of a storage unit!  Conveniently located, just off I64,  and only 1 mile to the Mardi Gras Casino.
sectionedDescription/transit: Conveniently located just 3/4 of a mile off of I-64 in Cross Lanes WV,  and  around the corner to shopping and restaurants, we are only 1 mile to the Mardi Gras Casino and 3.4 miles to West Virginia State University.  We are 13 minutes to downtown Charleston, 20 minutes to the Yeager Airport and just 45 minutes to Huntington and Marshall University.

primaryHost/about:
Hello, 
Meeks Rentals and Leasing is located in Hurricane WV. We provide long term and short term rentals up and down the east coast. Feel free to ask us any questions you may have and enjoy your stay with us!
sectionedDescription/description:
Experience Huntington city living without being in the inconvenience of downtown in this stylish 3 bedroom, 1 full bath home! Stocked with towels, linens, and cooking necessities, this home is perfect for a traveling professional! This home is 3.4 miles from Cabell Huntington Hospital and 4.8 miles from St. Mary's Hospital. Enjoy the lovely town and all it has to offer, from fine prepared foods, to the great night life.

additionalHouseRules:
- No smoking, vaping, incense, or sage/smudge sticks of any kind
- No open flames
- No parties
- Additional cleaning fees will be assessed to clean any odors, stains, or soiled items
- Please do not rearrange the furniture
- Please be respectful of antique furniture. It's had a long life and I want to make sure it has a lot of life left
- Please keep noise to a minimum between 11:00 pm and 6:00 am
- If guests are suspected of carrying, using, or dealing illegal drugs of any kind, the authorities will be contacted, and guests will be asked to vacate the property immediately and will not be entitled to a refund of any kind
- Anyone under 18 must be actively supervised by a parent or guardian at all times
- Please unplug any electrical devices while not in use or when leaving for the day
- No unregistered guests
- No groups of more than 5 (including children). An additional $25 fee per person per night will be assessed for each person beyond the 5th. The reservation may be cancelled without refund for continued violations
- Please ensure any pets are listed on the guest list

- Please drip the kitchen faucet if the low temperature will be below 20°F. If you need help please let me know. 
- Please keep the inside temperature between 50°F and 80F°
- Please turn off all lights when you leave

Please let me know immediately if something is malfunctioning so it can be addressed. However, the guest is responsible for all damage and missing items.

If any items are accidentally left behind, please make arrangements with me to pick them up or to arrange for shipment.  Do NOT come back into the apartment and pick them up without prior arrangments being made after the rental period.

Guests found to be in violation of any of these rules may be asked to leave immediately and required to cancel the remainder of their stay.

name: A private loft above an art gallery.
sectionedDescription/access: Guests have the entire apartment to themselves, plus access to the shared hallway, stairwell, and parking lot.
sectionedDescription/description:
Old US Post Office converted into an art gallery with apartments above.  The apartment has lots of charm and modern updates. It features lots of natural light, quiet neighborhood, and it's close to downtown and local parks.  There are several small businesses within walking distance. I offer a private parking lot with 24-hour surveillance. An adorable dog lives next door and offers free petting and tail wags.

Guests have the entire apartment to themselves, plus access to the shared hallway, stairwell, and parking lot.

I will provide the door code and other logistics prior to arrival.  

You won't be sharing any part of the apartment, so feel free to come and go as you please.

I live in the back apartment, which is just across the hallway, so if you need anything please let me know.

The apartment is located in a quiet neighborhood, and it's close to downtown and local parks.  There are several small businesses within walking distance.

There is a bus stop located out in front of the apartment. A short walk down the road will take you to downtown Huntington.

***Cleaning Routine***
I meticulously clean all parts of the apartment. All linens are washed in hot water with Tide sensitive skin pods and fragrance free bleach.  I wipe down all surfaces with clorox spray and then wipe the surfaces a second time to make them shiny with 409 multi spray. I vaccum the floors and use Bona cleaner since the floors are antique. I also wipe down the hallway leading to the apartment. I don't use the shared hallway while I have guests to minimize any possible risks of exposure. I use our back door to come and go.

The rented space is listed as Apartment 2.  Please enter through the front door, marked with a metallic Airbnb logo. At the top of the stairs, the door will be on your right; also marked with a metallic Airbnb logo.

Please let me know if you have any allergies or other special considerations that may impact your stay and I will do my best to accommodate you.

It features lots of natural light, quiet neighborhood, and it's close to downtown and local parks.  There are several small businesses within walking distance. I offer a private parking lot with 24-hour surveillance. An adorable dog lives next door and offers free petting and tail wags.

sectionedDescription/description:
Located just minutes outside Huntington city limits, this trendy 2 bedroom, 2 bath apartment is centrally located between Huntington and Barboursville locations.  Just 15 minutes to Marshall University (Joan C. Edwards Stadium and Cam Henderson Center), 20 minutes minutes to downtown Huntington (Big Sandy Arena), 15 minutes to Cabell Huntington Hospital, 10 minutes
to St. Mary's Hospital.  And 15 minutes to Huntington Mall and Barboursville Park/Soccer Complex.

While visiting the Huntington area, enjoy the comfort of this stylish 2 bedroom apartment, that includes washer and dryer and a bathroom for each bedroom. It is fully furnished with all new modern furniture and stainless steel appliances. Includes internet service and netflix.

We live in the same neighborhood so we are most always available if any questions or situations arise.

name: Hunt Cottage-3 Miles from Downtown Charleston
sectionedDescription/access: Lockbox grants you access with a key.
sectionedDescription/description:
Charming, remodeled private cottage completely surrounded by West Virginia nature! No neighbors in sight and less than 2 miles from I-64. Enjoy the peace and quiet of a cottage in the mountains only 3 miles from all bars, restaurants, and entertainment! Convenient to:
CAMC General (2.5 miles)
CAMC Memorial (5.3 miles)
Thomas Memorial (7.7 miles)
Airport  (6.6 miles)
Charleston Coliseum and Convention-Center (2.1 miles)
University of Charleston (6.1 miles)
Mardi Gras Casino (14 miles/20 minutes)

Guests have access to entire house and property to enjoy throughout your stay. Surrounding property includes 3/4 of an acre of beautiful rolling hills and scenery. Flight of steps will lead you to a cozy house including 2 bedrooms, 1 bath, full kitchen, comfortable living room and outdoor entertaining area. This house is convenient to everything and perfect for traveling nurses and professionals!

Lockbox grants you access with a key.

If you need anything, please don't hesitate to contact us!

Charleston is a vibrant and trendy city and you are only 2.7 miles from historic Capital Street. 

Come stay with us in the heart of West Virginia's Capital City!

BEST FALL VIEWS of the changing foliage!!
🍁🍂🍁🍂🍁

Capitol building (3.4 miles)
Charleston town center mall (2.3 miles)
Shawnee sports complex (10 miles)

Shampoo, conditioner, soap, toilet paper, paper towels, laundry detergent,  and coffee are all provided to get you started. 

Large parking area.

Flight of steps(pictured) that leads to entrance. Steps are salted in the winter and roads are scraped by city early in the morning if it snows. Parking pad can be slippery if ice occurs! We will salt in advance but please be cautious in winter months.

Smart TVs in every room that include Netflix. There are other apps on the TVs that you can use your personal log-in if you prefer.

Unlimited WIFI. 

WIFI calling may be needed for cell service. Some guests have perfect service without it  and some guest have no reception without wifi calling enabled on their phones.

House includes pots and pans, silverware, cooking utensils, plates & cups (for up to 4 people) and dishwasher. House also has electric stove with pizza oven.

Access to propane grill.

Washer and dryer.

Check-in 4pm or later.
Check-out 11am unless arranged in advance.

Used towels can be placed in gray laundry hamper located in the laundry room and beds left unmade. 

No smoking or vaping inside. 
No pets.

sectionedDescription/description:
Quaint getaway in a peaceful setting offers a distant hillside view with an occasional train coming around the hill. This second story apartment has..
. Three bedrooms
. Two bathrooms
.  Kitchen
.  Dining area
.  Living room
.  Wifi
.  Wash room with washer and dryer
.  Free parking

Great location for traveling healthcare professionals or anyone interested in work in the nearby towns. 
No smoking or pets allowed.

I have a no pet policy and this includes service animals because I have allergies. I take daily prescribed medicines plus monthly allergy shots. I love animals but I am the one who cleans the apartment.

This is a stand alone apartment. Inside spaces are not shared with anyone. The parking is shared with the first story guest.

Great location for traveling healthcare professionals or anyone interested in work in the nearby towns. This apartment is within 
 
5 minutes of Martin ARH Our Lady of the way Hospital
 
15 minutes of Prestonsburg Highlands ARH Regional Medical Center
 
20-25 minutes to Paintsville Paul B. Hall regional Medical Center
 
20-25 minutes to Pikeville       Medical Center

20 minutes to McDowell ARH Hospital

A blacktop parking area is available in front of the apartment. This area is shared with the 1st floor guest.

If your stay is during the summer you may hear the lawn mower or weed eater. 

This is a very safe place to stay. My last two bookings were traveling healthcare professionals who worked at Pikeville Medical during their stay. I have had many long term stays. There is a built in discount for stays of 28 days or longer.

primaryHost/about:
Our Story... 

Hi, we are Ron and Nancy Thaxton, your host,
living on 17 mountain acres  20
minutes outside of our State Capital, Charleston, WV. 

Our beautiful property, "Old Woodland Acres" has been in our family for over 150 years.

It is a well kept secret... offering tranquility to an otherwise noisy, crowded
world.
 
Ron's professional degree is Accounting and mine, (Nancy) is Education. We have 2 daughters and son-n-laws, plus 3 granddaughters, Stormie, Starr, Lakyn and 1 grandson, Che River (their very names reflect our natural surroundings) 

We are Entrepreneurs & Business Owners, including a Travel Agency “Regal Travel by Design”, both domestic & international Travel, Weddings “Dream Weddings & Events” International Safari Company “Wild Heart African Safaris” East Africa, Business Coaching “The Art of Entrepreneur" to our own Rustic Venue, Old Woodland Acres.

We are also Pastors to Pastors in our beautiful city and state of Charleston, West Virginia. 
 
We have traveled the world but our home is our beautiful West Virginia

We enjoy long walks on our 17 acre estate past small rock cliffs, an old farm chicken house, the generational initial trees started by Ron's initials carved by his grandfather to now the 5th generation.  We cross a rocky creek and explore a pine tree grove on the top of the mountain. We also enjoy watching the wild life including several species of birds, deer, ground hogs, foxes, squirrels and any other animal that may wonder by. 

Our Guest are welcome to participate in our excursions, picking apples from the orchard or roasting marshmallows on an open fire. We also offer tenting, mountain biking and hunting packages. 

Creating Memories
Nancy
sectionedDescription/access: Private Cottage sitting on the front of our 17 acres. You have full use of the cottage and are welcome to explore the property on your own or with a guide to introduce you to the "Old Woodland Acres".
sectionedDescription/description:
Hi, I'm glad you stopped by my Country-Chic Cottage-Starry Night. Look around the Cottage, our City and the professional photo shoot on Old Woodland Acres featured in, "Wedding Chicks. Every Season of year and life is celebrated at Old Woodland Acres. Enjoy my 2 Designer Bedrooms, Soaking Tub & Full Bath, Cozy Livingroom with Blue Tooth Electric Wall Fireplace to the Brilliance of color in the Kitchen. Take a walk in our 17 acre Forest or build a fire in the Fire Pit and Grill. -Nancy, Host

So Excited... My #AirBnB Country-Chic Cottage is ready for guest...This little cottage is located on our 17 acre mountain 





The cottage itself is just a short driveway off the main highway, into Old Woodland Acres, the best kept secret of beauty in the woodlands. You will be thrust out of the bright lights & pace of the city to the tranquil wonder of nature. 



WHO WE HOST... Business Travelers, Couples, Honeymooners, World Travelers, Interns, Job Seekers, Small Families, and anyone who's looking for a place to call home for a while. (please read the rules for the cottage). Are you an artist or writing a book? or attending a conference, or training for a job?...then contact us for long stay arrangements. 

Although we strictly enforce our policy of No Parties or Photo Shoots at the cottage, you may book our venue, Old Woodland Acres, for engagements, weddings, bridal/baby showers, & photo shoots.   

(Reminder, No Parties, Photo Shoots or Overnight guest - No Smoking (in house) - penalty is lost of deposit, immediate eviction. damages & no refund of lost days)

The cottage is 10-15+ minutes -west of the Capital City, Charleston WV,-proper- full of night-life, outdoor concerts, quaint shops, convention center, specialty restaurants, and shopping at the largest In-City Mall. CRW (Yeager Airport is approx 25-30mins. Explore southern West Virginia unique history, visit the beautiful State Capitol, the Clay Center for Arts and Science, and go see a live Mountain Stage Radio Show.  There's lots to do in this little bitty city.


The cottage is  only 20+minutes -west from a large commercial center with a 12 screen movie theater, Sky Zone Trampoline Park, restaurants, grocery stores, Cabellas, Gander Mountain, Kohl's, Marshalls, Dick's sporting goods, Books a Million and other such stores. 


The cottage is 3 miles- 10min  -east of I-64 Cross Lanes Exit, community grocery stores, small mini mall, restaurants, spa and WV's only casino - Mardi Gras Casino with New Orleans flair, featuring slots, poker, greyhound racing, restaurants and more.


The cottage is 2 bedrooms - 1st BR queen bed/TV 2nd BR 2 twins/TV - Bath is equipped with a socking tub and a double head shower that only a rocket scientist can work. The Eat-In Kitchen is set up with Wood Kitchen table/4 chairs, Gas Range, Frig,/Ice Maker, Dishwasher, Microwave, Toaster and a Coffee Bar.. It is also Business friendly with free wifi. Upon booking you will receive a unique door lock code so you do not need to worry about a key exchange. 

Our mountain retreat "Old Woodland Acres" has been in the family for over 150 years and the site of #weddings, #photoshoots, #engagements, #bridal & baby showers, #tea parties and now we have added an airbnb #CottageIndustry. You will experience  17 acres of woodland magic in the heart of Appalachia, West Virginia.  The wooded acreage is a haven of wildlife... very quiet and private, You could see an eagle soar over the tree tops or beautiful deer, flock of turkeys, a fox dins, pine grove, generational initial trees, along the walking trails. You can pre-arrange some fun activities (seasonal) Like building a campfire, enjoy story telling or just gaze at the beauty of each season, and enjoy the artistry of poet Jeff Eberbough reading from his "Road Kill" Cookbook, taste of award winning Chili, a bonfire and Hot Chocolate (seasonal) ... or if your heart is strong you can take a night tour of the old family cemetery and maybe catch sight of a vacant Old Mountain Still. and/or go to the city for shopping, enjoying fine dining, or go to a sport's bar. You will find all these options easily available. 

Mountain Stage known World Wide is right here in our Capital City.

Private Cottage sitting on the front of our 17 acres. You have full use of the cottage and are welcome to explore the property on your own or with a guide to introduce you to the "Old Woodland Acres".

We love to make our guests feel at home, away from home. There's coffee or tea, hot chocolate stocked in our well equipped kitchen. We are happy to visit with our guests, but are sensitive to your privacy also. We know that guests typically arrive tired from travel, so we try to let you get settled as quickly as possible. (Food and Drink goodies may change according to season)

There are cottages on both sides of the 'Starry Night' cottage, "Stormie Day" & "Lakyn's Wishing Well". Our guest are welcome to walk through the "Woodland Forest" in development for our Fairytale Weddings, past an old Chicken Coup to the generational initial trees, pine groves, rock cliffs or pitching a tent at Che's  "Campsite".  You may see a deer or two grazing behind the Cottage or on a "quiet" walk through the woods. there also could be  a large flock of turkeys or other critters.

There is a bus system but a car is recommended. We are in a rural area of Charleston, WV.

" Old roads, Old dogs, Old folks and Old ways still have a lot to offer in this sped-up world we all live in."  

We will provide a welcome guide book with all the information you will need to help make your stay, successful. 

No Pets: $200 penalty plus lost of deposit, immediate eviction. damages & no refund of lost days)
No Smoking:  $200 penalty plus lost of deposit, immediate eviction. damages & no refund of lost days)
Quiet Time: after 10pm
*Winter Warning: Located in West Virginia, be prepared for snowy driveways. We do our best to clear drives or offer flat gravel parking space immediately off the main road with short walk to cottages. Our Country Chic Cottage is located on a short steep paved driveway which is rough due to weather. 

We are 10-30 minutes from restaurants, grocery stores and shopping.  We have parking for 2 cars with a little trick to turning around. The cottage is on a semi-steep short driveway for those who are flat-landers. Everywhere in WV is on a hill. Smile. Sorry, no parties, but business guest may conduct meetings. There is a strict check-in and check-out policy. Also we have a strict up to 4 guest maximum and after check-in we do not offer refunds for any reason.

To make your arrival special, we provide complimentary fresh baked speciality bread with vanilla cream cheese topping from a Local Farm-type Eatery, bottled water, and a variety of coffees, chocolate & teas, ready for brewing in our Keurig coffee maker! (Drinks & Goodies may change according to season)

For safety, we have a smoke detectors, CO detector, fire extinguisher in the kitchen, first aid kit, and our phone numbers for emergency situations.

You'll find a hair dryer in the bathroom, and we provide an iron with ironing board for your use.

sectionedDescription/summary: Hi, I'm glad you stopped by my Country-Chic Cottage-Starry Night. Look around the Cottage, our City and the professional photo shoot on Old Woodland Acres featured in, "Wedding Chicks. Every Season of year and life is celebrated at Old Woodland Acres. Enjoy my 2 Designer Bedrooms, Soaking Tub & Full Bath, Cozy Livingroom with Blue Tooth Electric Wall Fireplace to the Brilliance of color in the Kitchen. Take a walk in our 17 acre Forest or build a fire in the Fire Pit and Grill. -Nancy, Host

sectionedDescription/description:
If you are on a  Business trip or looking for a relaxing getaway  you will be captivated by the “Lil Honey Bear Inn”.  All new, upscale and decked out!  Adjustable King bed w premium linens, electric love seat, Big screen TV in living and bed room, shower panel w rain head/shower jets and half bath in  master suite.   Enjoy the views from the front porch or if you get adventurous  take a hike on the 25 acres. 
  The special touches will make your stay a memorable one.       
Don’t miss this one.

Lil Honey Bear is private and surrounded  by trees, wondering deer, chipmunk, squirrels and birds .  Convenient to downtown Ironton OH, Ashland Ky and Huntington, WV.

You will have access to the entire house .

I would be glad to answer questions about the property or the area.

Country setting quiet.

Covered Carport parking to the front door.

additionalHouseRules:
- Etiquette in shared areas: Fully clothed (not half naked, in underwear, bath towels).
- No 3rd party reservations. See: https://www.airbnb.com/help/article/427/can-i-book-on-behalf-of-a-friend-or-family-member 
- Quiet hours will be observed from 9 p.m. until 6 a.m. No additional guests are permitted. Neither Smoking nor vaping is permitted in the house. Designated smoking areas outside are established. 
- We have two Boxers, and three house cats indoors. Anyone with pet allergies should consider another location. Known food allergens are kept in-house, these include but are not limited to nuts, fish, milks, eggs, gluten, and others. 
- This is a two-story, 1920's era home and is not handicap accessible.

primaryHost/about: I am a mobile notary who loves making homemade breads, cheeses, yogurt, and soaps.  I enjoy upcycling, I wrote "Everyday Upcycle" a column in the WV publication Two-Lane Livin.  I authored four books, you can find them on Amazon. I live with my husband, one Boxer, and several cats. We enjoy hearing about our guests' traveling adventures. **NOW WITH CHICKENS!**
sectionedDescription/access: Guest have access to the first level, front porch, and the guest bedroom upstairs. Guest are not allowed in the basement. Use of the kitchen should be limited to non-alcoholic beverages and snack. Guest are not permitted to cook.
sectionedDescription/description:
**CHECK-IN/out times are FIRM: In 3-6 pm, out 9 am.** This 2-story 1920's era home offers original Airbnb mom and   pop experience with a private room just for you. Off historic Midland Trail (U.S.  60), 3   miles to I-64/77, 15 miles to Downtown Charleston, 18 miles to Kanawha State Forest 35 miles to Hawks Nest State Park, 46 miles to Summit Bechtel Reserve.  Walk or run the paved elementary or high school tracks two blocks away.  Five food options within one mile.

> CHECK-IN/OUT TIMES ARE FIRM
> No children
> No pets
> Not handicap accessible
> No 3rd Party Reservations 

Guests enjoy the *original* Airbnb experience with a solid night's sleep on a full-sized bed in the upstairs bedroom. Local, digital over-the-air television, and Wi-Fi, a selection of classic books, and local magazines to enjoy in the over-sized rocking chair are available no additional charge.

Guests may use  closet and dresser.

The downstairs bathroom features a 1918 cast-iron claw-foot tub with added shower, an early 1920's cast-iron sink, and classic black-and-white tiles. 

Quiet hours will be observed from 9 p.m. until 6 a.m. No additional guests are permitted. Smoking is not permitted in the house. Designated smoking areas outside are established.

Guest have access to the first level, front porch, and the guest bedroom upstairs. Guest are not allowed in the basement. Use of the kitchen should be limited to non-alcoholic beverages and snack. Guest are not permitted to cook.

Interactions with guest will be frequent, but not intrusive. We live in the house, I run my business from the house. A light breakfast (breads, coffee/tea, juice, milk, cereals etc. - no cooking)  will be offered in the dining room most days.

Residence is located in unincorporated town of **Diamond, a mature community which houses an elementary school, a high school, and several small businesses. **GPS and mapping apps usually tag the city as Belle.

Public bus transportation is approximately two blocks away. Bicycling is welcome, however there are no designated bicycle lanes in this area.

Within one mile of the residence is a Walmart, Tractor Supply, Shoney's,  Taco Bell, McDonald's, Arby's, or SubWay sandwich (inside WalMart). Please note: no bars/pubs within walking distance. To  protect our Boxer, and two house cats we do not accept guests with pets.  Anyone with pet allergies should consider another location. 

Known food allergens are kept in-house, these include but are not limited to nuts, fish, milks, eggs, gluten, and others. This is a two-story, 1920's era home and is not handicap accessible.

The downstairs bathroom features a 1918 cast-iron claw-foot tub with added shower, an early 1920's cast-iron sink, and classic black-and-white tiles. 

Quiet hours will be observed from 9 p.m. until 6 a.m. No additional guests are permitted. Smoking is not permitted in the house. Designated smoking areas outside are established.
sectionedDescription/summary: **CHECK-IN/out times are FIRM: In 3-6 pm, out 9 am.** This 2-story 1920's era home offers original Airbnb mom and   pop experience with a private room just for you. Off historic Midland Trail (U.S.  60), 3   miles to I-64/77, 15 miles to Downtown Charleston, 18 miles to Kanawha State Forest 35 miles to Hawks Nest State Park, 46 miles to Summit Bechtel Reserve.  Walk or run the paved elementary or high school tracks two blocks away.  Five food options within one mile.

name: The "Highlander" Rustic Yurt
primaryHost/about:
Rustic Ravines is the perfect getaway
Nestled in the foothills of the Allegheny Mountains, Rustic Ravines cabin rentals is West Virginia’s Ideal escape from the hustle and bustle of everyday life. Our cabins sit on 300 acres of wooded paradise and are surrounded by 50,000 acres of private and public ATV trails, and other activities as diverse as kayaking, archery, fishing, hunting and golf. Our cabin rental facilities are ideal for events of all kinds. We’re located in Genoa, West Virginia, 27 miles south of Huntington and the Ohio River.
rootAmenitySections/1/subtitle: The host hasn't reported a carbon monoxide detector on the property.
sectionedDescription/access: They will have access to all of the property; approximately 300 acres to hike and explore and enjoy!
sectionedDescription/description:
Our Highlander Yurt is an extremely unique structure. An Octagonal Yurt made from trees that were harvested from the property. Our pictures tell you a lot and give you an intriguing glimpse, but you will still be blown away when you see the structure in person. The 8 main support logs are great Ash Trees that were harvested from the property because they were dying. The metal roof is a Corn Bin Roof that provides a 20' high dome in the center

The space is an open floor plan and has many cool design features. A 65" TV with free WIFI and equipped with an Amazon Fire Stick for your viewing pleasure.  The Highlander has a very large U-shaped bar that doubles as a dining area/gathering space. And don't forget to check out the jacuzzi on the back deck ;)

They will have access to all of the property; approximately 300 acres to hike and explore and enjoy!

We do have ATV rentals available if you'd like to cruise around the area on a Side-by-side ;)

sectionedDescription/access: You will have access to the entire Cabin in addition to the shared overlook just behind the house to enjoy some relaxation in nature with a great view. The overlook is a short steep walk just behind the cabin.
sectionedDescription/description:
Elk Creek Trail House #320  is an ideal location for HatField Mcoy trail riders and/or Motorcyclist exploring the southern West Virginia Hills. Located only 5 miles from the Hatfield Mcoy Buffalo mountain trail head #14. It is legal to ride to the trail head on the road. There is a quick mart on the way where you can get gas, trail permits and snacks. Also Just 10 miles from route 119 on the famous Devils den Motorcycle routes which offers over 1000 miles of incredible Motorcycle riding

This unit is brand new as of July 2019.
Parking is limited ( see photos)  if you have a big trailer we can arrange you to park it at our larger cabin next door up.
We have an additional 3 bedroom/2 bath private cabin just a short walk next door for larger groups that could require both.

You will have access to the entire Cabin in addition to the shared overlook just behind the house to enjoy some relaxation in nature with a great view. The overlook is a short steep walk just behind the cabin.

Available by text from 7am-9pm
We have Local support if anything is needed or should issues arise.

Nice quiet neighborhood surround by incredibly nice  people

atv/utv dirt bikes are all allowed to drive on the secondary roads (not highways or interstates) but you can go pretty much everywhere.  helmets are required . obey normal traffic laws speeds and safety

The driveway is pretty steep and made made of stone. Motorcyclist should see photos and judge if you and your bike are capable.

Only 30 minutes from Logan, WV Walmart, Lowes, tractor supply, and shopping center.

name: West Virginia house on Old Crooked Creek
p3SummaryAddress: Teays Valley, West Virginia, United States
sectionedDescription/description:
A quaint and cozy home with artistic accents and a spacious yard with great parking, the WV home on Old Crooked Creek provides rest and relaxation while also being located very conveniently to interstate 64 and route 35. With Charleston and Huntington just a short drive away, travelers and extended guests will have many options to explore food and entertainment. The Teays Valley/Hurricane/Winfield area have plenty of  local restaurants, delis and butchers for guests to enjoy.

New fenced yard!

The home is located just off the Scott Depot exit of I-64 and end of Route 35. Super convenient for travelers and explorers alike. If you’re looking for some local home grown restaurants, we have several in the immediate are and even more in Charleston and Huntington. 
     Belknap’s Dough Company (pizza and craft beer) and The Bridge Cafe (farm to table deliciousness) are in Hurricane. Hussons Pizza and Fireside Bar and Grill are in Scott Depot/Teays Valley area and Mo Beta BBQ is just across route 34 in Winfield. Give any of them a try, can’t miss!

name: Secluded Home with Pond-Front View on 40 Acres
photos/24/caption: Enjoy your morning coffee on the upper level deck while being serenaded by the melodies of nature all around.
sectionedDescription/description:
Pure Country is a warm and inviting, "home away from home" with a rustic feel. This secluded property is nestled in a serene country setting on 40 acres, surrounded by hills, tall pines, and a pond-front view. Pure Country is a place to escape that gives all visitors the opportunity to flee from the fast-paced world. Just minutes from I-64, and the Huntington Tri-State Airport.

This spacious home offers a comfortable and relaxing stay for your vacation.

On the main level, you'll find three inviting bedrooms with cozy queen beds, ceiling fans, and flat screen TVs for your comfort and entertainment. Additionally, there are two full baths, ensuring convenience for all guests.

The upper deck, accessible from the kitchen area, provides the perfect spot to unwind and savor your morning coffee. Immerse yourself in the tranquil ambiance as you listen to the melodies of wildlife and the soothing sounds of nature.

Adjacent to the living area, you'll discover a fully equipped kitchen and dining area, complete with a microwave, dishwasher, and a convenient coffee and tea bar. We've also stocked the cookware you need to prepare delicious home-cooked meals. However, if cooking isn't part of your vacation plans, fret not! Numerous local restaurants are just a short drive away.

Relax and bond with your loved ones in the family room, where a cozy gas-burning fireplace awaits. Gather around and enjoy a movie together, with access to Wi-Fi and Dish Network for your entertainment needs.

The lower level of the house offers an additional spacious area with a well-equipped kitchen, perfect for prepping your meals before heading out to the gas grill just steps away.

Immerse yourself in the beauty of nature surrounding the property. Embark on a nature hike, find solace in a captivating book by the lake, or indulge in the tranquil activity of fishing. As dusk settles in, embrace the crackling fire and witness the enchanting sight of fireflies illuminating the night. Look up at the star-filled sky and let feelings of tranquility wash over you. Take a deep breath of the fresh country air and appreciate the wonders of our world.

We can't wait to host you and provide an unforgettable experience during your stay.

Large parking pad in front of the home, accommodating 8-10 vehicles. Overflow parking available.

Parties or events are not permitted. 
No pets allowed at this property.

sectionedDescription/access:
PRIVATE ROOM ONLY- for the weary traveler needing only a place for temporary rest-until you hit the road again. This Private bedroom has a bathroom inside.

Shared Living Room. Shared Kitchen. Shared dining space. Shared office/work area. Shared Washers & dryers in Laundry Rooms are available in 3 of the apartments. Laundry may have to be scheduled-if your space doesn’t have one & your stay is longer than 6 days.
sectionedDescription/description:
Renovations COMPLETED!!!
3 Blocks off the Ohio River.  Be on the border.  Love life.

Call your #1 Realtor Shirley G for this and any other homes you’d enjoy here in Huntington or tri-state area.  Have a wonderful stay and “make sure you do everything I wouldn’t do”.

This booking is only a PRIVATE bedroom.  with bathroom door inside this bedroom. PRIVATE desk.  SHARED living room. SHARED kitchen. SHARED pots and pans. SHARED cups & dishes.  SHARED dining area. SHARED bathroom in the daytime. SHARED TV in the living room.  Are you ok with this or do you need the “whole apartment”? Full apartment is only $25 more per night.

Inside the apartment is very peaceful, cozy, and modern.  Free wifi.

Exterior/Neighborhood:
On the border of Ohio River= State of Ohio and it’s next to Ashland, Kentucky.  4 Minutes to Marshall University. 4 minutes to Downtown Huntington. 3 blocks east of “Old” Downtown “Central City”.  Be 40 minutes away from the capital, Charleston. Mountains view- ALL DAY LONG.

PRIVATE ROOM ONLY- for the weary traveler needing only a place for temporary rest-until you hit the road again. This Private bedroom has a bathroom inside.

Shared Living Room. Shared Kitchen. Shared dining space. Shared office/work area. Shared Washers & dryers in Laundry Rooms are available in 3 of the apartments. Laundry may have to be scheduled-if your space doesn’t have one & your stay is longer than 6 days.

I would love to socialize-if you’d like. I enjoy getting to know people.  Am available to all guests by phone, texts, or steps away in the next building (if need be).

Everything.  Marshall University. Pullman Square Shopping Center. Cabell Huntington Hispital, St Mary’s Hospital, King’s Daughters Hospital, Marathon Huge Gas Plant, Just look at Google map.  Highways, Restaurants, grocery stores, Dollar stores, gas stations, old downtown, shopping...you name it...

Car, bike, or Uber

Jogging or running trail along the Ohio River- accessible only 3 blocks away. Enjoy staying fit while vacationing. Yoga mats available to borrow- upon request.

Hello, River 2 Ridge Outfitters is a newly remodeled 3 BR, 2 Bath house. We can accommodate up to 12 people in beds. Full kitchen, LR, dining room, washer/dryer, garage mud room, fire pit, SXS wash station, covered storage, and free WiFi.  Perfect location in southern WV to ride/hike the beautiful mountains. We are approximately 1.5 miles from trails that link with HM Trail system (Buffalo Mtn)accessible from lodge, so you don’t have to trailer machines.Any questions contact us at 304-784-1719.

additionalHouseRules:
Must be 23 or older to book unless you contact host for preapproval.  
Absolutely no booking for anyone other than yourself. This is against airbnb policy. 

 No Smoking or vaping. No use of illegal drugs. NO 420. 

Cottage quiet time is from 10pm - 6am. For the comfort of all guests please limit kitchen use, showering (showering when arriving from a late check in or if work hours involve you getting back late is permissible just please be courteous of other guests who are sleeping) and loud noise during these hours. 

Hand wash and put always all used dishes directly after use. No dishes are allowed to remain dirty in the sink overnight. 

The cottage is environmentally friendly and I ask that you try to reuse bath towels. There are hooks for used towels in the bathroom and on the closet door of each room. 
Place used towels and washcloths that need laundered in laundry basket in hall. 

Please use vent fan in bathroom during showers to allow moisture to escape and prevent mildew buildup.

Lower level deck and lower area of the cottage are both off limits to guests. 

No overnight guests permitted. No visiting guests allowed. This can cause a safety issue with other guests since they are not registered. 

$10 fee for lost bedroom key
$25 fee for ruined  or stained sheets 
$50 fee for ruined or stained  comforter

This cozy room has a view of the side and back garden. Queen bed with dresser, small desk area and closet. With a ceiling fan, stand fan, and lamp

primaryHost/about: Hello. my name is Rebecca. I worked in the medical field for many years and now work for the state of WV and own an Aerial Yoga studio. In my spare time I volunteer for a disaster relief organization and am a certified chainsaw operator.  I have a passion for travel and love the outdoors. My goal for my airbnb is to make everyone feel at home in the "cottage away from home."
sectionedDescription/access: Feel free to use the side porch, lighted deck area and outdoor gas grill during your stay.
sectionedDescription/description:
Cozy South Hills cottage in a premium location in Charleston, WV excellent for medical professionals. Safe & quiet area 1.2m to downtown Charleston Capitol Street area. 2.1m to CAMC General. 4.5m to CAMC Memorial. 3.6m to CAMC Women's & Children's. 7.4m to Thomas Memorial. 4.7m to DOW Chemical. 6.2m to CRW. Private Bedroom, queen bed, dresser, desk,  Hardwood floors. Spacious shared kitchen, living room & bathroom. Bedroom with keyed lock. Smoke & Pet Free. Long term stays welcome. 23+ to book

Linens, towels and washcloths are provided. All kitchen utensils are provided. There is a gas grill located on the upper deck available for use. This is a quiet, cozy,  cottage and is sure to make your stay in Charleston enjoyable and relaxing. Wifi tv available upon request. Please be aware the common areas (bathroom, kitchen, living room, dining room, and patio) of the cottage are shared between all 3 airbnb rooms and myself.

Feel free to use the side porch, lighted deck area and outdoor gas grill during your stay.

Guests may reach me via text, email or calls. I will be on the premises throughout the day if you have any questions.

0.7 - 0.8 mile walk to Bridge Road shops. Including:
Lola's Pizza, 
Bridge Road Bistro,
Bridge Mart and Deli,
Rite Aid, 
Hudson's Pizza

Also a short walk to connect to the Carriage Trail walking trail.

Uber and Lyft available but highly unreliable. Bus transportation not available. Please be sure to have access to a vehicle during your stay as walking to downtown is not possible due to no sidewalks and a curvy road.

Cottage quiet time is from 10pm - 6am. For the comfort of all guests please limit kitchen use and loud noise during these hours. No smoking or vaping.  No pets due to host allergy.

additionalHouseRules:
Dear guests,

Hello and welcome to our home!  We’re so happy you chose our property for your stay.  Before you settle in and get comfortable, we would like to make you aware of the House Rules in place at our rental.  Most of these are just common courtesy.                                              

Please ensure you read and fully understand the house rules at the beginning of your stay. If anything is unclear, please contact us so we can explain in further detail to avoid any misunderstandings.

Please leave the beds you have slept in unmade so that the cleaners know which sheets to change, and pile all the dirty towels in the bathtub. If a bed is unslept in, just leave it made up neatly so we don't waste time washing clean linens. 

No parties, quiet hours are 9:00PM-9:00AM
No Pets,
No Smoking, vaping, e cigs, and marajuana 
$1,000 will be charged for violating these rules.

There is a digital keypad to enter the building.
There is a complimentary parking pass required to park.

If the parking pass is not put back at your departure there will be a $200 charge for the replacement of the pass. 

If you cannot live with our rules it may be in your best interest to book elsewhere.

●	Please treat the loft with the same respect as you would your own home. We’ve put a lot of effort into making this a lovely space to be enjoyed by our guests. This property is “new” and has all-new finishes from top to bottom and we hope it stays that way. 

●	Please keep the loft clean during your stay. It’s not the cleaner's job to clean up excessive messes and chaos left behind for them to deal with. 

●	In case of any accidental damage, please notify us immediately.  We can work together on how to repair/replace whatever is necessary. 

●	Please laugh a lot and have tons of fun! Just also understand that most of the residents here in the building call this home full time, and we would appreciate you being mindful of that -  especially later at night. We have become friends with all our neighbors and expect that we won't have any issues related to tenancy here at our place. 

●	If any neighboring residents report excessive noise or unruly behavior, we may have to evict you from our property and terminate your stay! This could result in your stay being nonrefundle based on the cancelation policy.

●	In the unlikely case of any disputes or neighbor complaints, it is your duty to notify us as soon as reasonably possible.

●	We try to keep our vacation rental as child-friendly as possible. That said, parents always have the final responsibility of ensuring their children’s safety at all times. If you find anything to be unsafe or that requires revision at our property, please contact us at your earliest convenience so we can address the issue. 

●	To maintain our property kid-friendly, we ask that you:
o	Never leave children unsupervised at our property without any adults.
o	Never let children play on out in the street unattended
o	Parents must not leave children unattended at any time. Any guest injuries sustained inside OR outside the house/apartment are not covered by our vacation rental insurance.

●	Please do not overload or underload the washer.  

●	Please make sure you switch off lights, fans or any other small electrical appliances when you go out. 

●	In the unlikely case of a power outage, please call us before touching the control panel.

●	No compensation will be given for any temporary outage of electricity, gas, water, cable, satellite or telephone service.

While we have taken the necessary measures to make our rental safe for incoming guests, you also have a role to play in ensuring the safety and security of your party. There are actions you can follow to keep the loft apartment secure during your stay.

●	Any time guests leave the rental, it is their responsibility to ensure all windows and doors are closed and locked to maintain security of the loft and prevent rain and water damage.

●	We are not responsible for the loss of any personal belongings or valuables. In case you misplace something in the loft, please let us know so we can look out for the item during the next cleaning. 

●	There is a trash dumpster directly across the street from the main enttance of the building (it is blue). If staying for a long period of time and you have excessive trash that needs disposed, please use this dumpster for disposal. Do not pile trash in the loft, hallway, or lobby area.
