primaryHost/about: From childhood to adulthood I currently live in “almost heaven” Charleston, WV. I enjoy meeting new people, traveling, and sight seeing. Eating good food is definitely at the top of the list! I'm also a local business owner who love supporting and giving back to our community.
sectionedDescription/access:
You will have the entire loft apartment to yourselves. 

Off street and on street public parking. On City bus routes. Uber/Lyft access. Walking distance to restaurants, shopping, entertainment and more.
sectionedDescription/description:
The beautiful thing about visiting Charleston, West Virginia is that you get the vibes of the city by staying downtown and break away for a total retreat to nature by visiting trails, parks and state forest within the mountains. All in a 10 to 15 minute commute. Come back to revive yourself with a comfortable and cozy stay at the newly renovated Atlas Loft for all your modern restful needs.

2 minutes off of I-64. Our loft apartment is located a couple of blocks to CAMC General Hospital and the Clay Center. Only 4 blocks to the the Town Center Mall, Municipal Center and the Charleston Coliseum  Convention Center. So you are in the middle of EVERYTHING to do in downtown Charleston, including restaurants and entertainment, but have plenty of room to spread out or stay for an extended length of time in full comfort and space. Quiet neighborhood but outstanding location! Newly remodeled! Open floor plan for kitchen, dining and living room space. 1 bed. 1 bath. Closet space, washer and dryer.

Our loft apartment was recently remodeled top to bottom, so it has the current and most luxurious flooring and furnishings available today. Nice furniture and decorations as well, making this place comfortable and clean. The neighbors mind their own business, and it is a peaceful and quiet neighborhood, with the perfect location. Capital Street is just two blocks away, with a great night life and restaurant row. Town Center Mall is within a seven minute walk and three minute drive, as well as being close to the Charleston Coliseum Convention Center and the Municipal Auditorium. Clay Center is just one block away as well as 2 blocks to CAMC General Hospital.

You will have the entire loft apartment to yourselves. 

Off street and on street public parking. On City bus routes. Uber/Lyft access. Walking distance to restaurants, shopping, entertainment and more.

I enjoy meeting new people and also like giving them space during their stay and travel. In an emergency or urgent situation I’m also available via phone call 24/7. For normal calls I take them between 8am and 9pm respectfully. All communication will be conducted through the AirBnB platform for security and safety measures.

Beautiful historic district of downtown Charleston, WV. Restaurants, shopping, entertainment, airport and hospitals within a 5 minute to 15 minute commute.

Our building is secured by a security door and elevator that cannot be entered unless you have a key fob or code of entry. Each guest is given a key and key fob or code to enter. Most of the residents of this building are middle aged and elderly, some of them will be lifetime residents, so they will not bother you, and we expect you to do the same.

There is public parking across the street from the building at ABM Parking Services. 

If you park your vehicle in the parking lot, for added security, we recommend that you lock your vehicle manually with the inside door lock button, rather than your remote key locker.

Our location is right downtown, so there are Ubers and taxis available, as well as a bus station four blocks away. The street in front of the building, Quarrier St., is on the bus line so you can catch the bus right there. The loft is only 5 miles to the airport and a short car ride. You will have ample parking for two or more cars if needed. Plenty of public parking available 24/7. Walking distance from all downtown amenities with public transportation available at your convenience.

Feel safe with a security entrances for lobby entry door, stair case, and elevator access.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
Dear guests,

Hello and welcome to our home!  We’re so happy you chose our property for your stay.  Before you settle in and get comfortable, we would like to make you aware of the House Rules in place at our rental.  Most of these are just common courtesy.                                              

Please ensure you read and fully understand the house rules at the beginning of your stay. If anything is unclear, please contact us so we can explain in further detail to avoid any misunderstandings.

Please leave the beds you have slept in unmade so that the cleaners know which sheets to change, and pile all the dirty towels in the bathtub. If a bed is unslept in, just leave it made up neatly so we don't waste time washing clean linens. 

No parties, quiet hours are 9:00PM-9:00AM
No Pets,
No Smoking, vaping, e cigs, and marajuana 
$1,000 will be charged for violating these rules.

There is a digital keypad to enter the building.
There is a complimentary parking pass required to park.

If the parking pass is not put back at your departure there will be a $200 charge for the replacement of the pass. 

If you cannot live with our rules it may be in your best interest to book elsewhere.

●	Please treat the loft with the same respect as you would your own home. We’ve put a lot of effort into making this a lovely space to be enjoyed by our guests. This property is “new” and has all-new finishes from top to bottom and we hope it stays that way. 

●	Please keep the loft clean during your stay. It’s not the cleaner's job to clean up excessive messes and chaos left behind for them to deal with. 

●	In case of any accidental damage, please notify us immediately.  We can work together on how to repair/replace whatever is necessary. 

●	Please laugh a lot and have tons of fun! Just also understand that most of the residents here in the building call this home full time, and we would appreciate you being mindful of that -  especially later at night. We have become friends with all our neighbors and expect that we won't have any issues related to tenancy here at our place. 

●	If any neighboring residents report excessive noise or unruly behavior, we may have to evict you from our property and terminate your stay! This could result in your stay being nonrefundle based on the cancelation policy.

●	In the unlikely case of any disputes or neighbor complaints, it is your duty to notify us as soon as reasonably possible.

●	We try to keep our vacation rental as child-friendly as possible. That said, parents always have the final responsibility of ensuring their children’s safety at all times. If you find anything to be unsafe or that requires revision at our property, please contact us at your earliest convenience so we can address the issue. 

●	To maintain our property kid-friendly, we ask that you:
o	Never leave children unsupervised at our property without any adults.
o	Never let children play on out in the street unattended
o	Parents must not leave children unattended at any time. Any guest injuries sustained inside OR outside the house/apartment are not covered by our vacation rental insurance.

●	Please do not overload or underload the washer.  

●	Please make sure you switch off lights, fans or any other small electrical appliances when you go out. 

●	In the unlikely case of a power outage, please call us before touching the control panel.

●	No compensation will be given for any temporary outage of electricity, gas, water, cable, satellite or telephone service.

While we have taken the necessary measures to make our rental safe for incoming guests, you also have a role to play in ensuring the safety and security of your party. There are actions you can follow to keep the loft apartment secure during your stay.

●	Any time guests leave the rental, it is their responsibility to ensure all windows and doors are closed and locked to maintain security of the loft and prevent rain and water damage.

●	We are not responsible for the loss of any personal belongings or valuables. In case you misplace something in the loft, please let us know so we can look out for the item during the next cleaning. 

●	There is a trash dumpster directly across the street from the main enttance of the building (it is blue). If staying for a long period of time and you have excessive trash that needs disposed, please use this dumpster for disposal. Do not pile trash in the loft, hallway, or lobby area.

So you are in the middle of EVERYTHING to do in downtown Charleston, including restaurants and entertainment, but have plenty of room to spread out or stay for an extended length of time in full comfort and space. sectionedDescription/summary: The beautiful thing about visiting Charleston, West Virginia is that you get the vibes of the city by staying downtown and break away for a total retreat to nature by visiting trails, parks and state forest within the mountains. All in a 10 to 15 minute commute. Come back to revive yourself with a comfortable and cozy stay at the newly renovated Atlas Loft for all your modern restful needs.

additionalHouseRules: ***IMPORTANT*** PETS: We do allow Non-Aggressive and Trained pets Only. You must check the pet box when making your reservation!! There are to be no more than 2 pets per apartment. This must be disclosed to us before booking. If having a pet is not disclosed,  you may be asked to leave or you may be locked out of your apartment until the reservation is changed. There is a pet fee of $30. If you are here for an extended period there will be an additional charge sent through the resolution center. It will not exceed a total pet fee of $150. Please check for this on the day of your arrival or possibly the following day if it pertains to you.

name: (u2) Lovely high end 1 bedroom with pull out sofa.
sectionedDescription/access:
Enjoy the privacy of a 1 bedroom, 1 bath apartment that is dedicated solely for guest use. The sofa also makes a bed. 
Keyless entry to your apartment. 
Free Street parking and also a free parking garage only a block away.
There are stairs to climb to reach your apartment.
sectionedDescription/description:
Surround yourself with understated elegance

Enjoy a great nights sleep on a premium mattress with whisper quiet remote ac. If you feel the need or just want to cook, all appliances are top of the line. And don’t run out to do laundry. Do it as you relax and watch one of the two smart tv’s.
THIS UNIT DOES NOT HAVE A WINDOW WITH A VIEW. THE WINDOW IS FOR EGRESS ONLY. IT DOES NOT GO TO THE OUTSIDE!

Enjoy the privacy of a 1 bedroom, 1 bath apartment that is dedicated solely for guest use. The sofa also makes a bed. 
Keyless entry to your apartment. 
Free Street parking and also a free parking garage only a block away.
There are stairs to climb to reach your apartment.

We will be available any time that we are needed and would love to meet each guest personally

We are located right in the middle of everything downtown! 
UPike, med school, optometry school, Appalachian Wireless Arena, historical museum, shopping, and restaurants. Pikeville Medical Center is within walking distance.

Walking will be suitable unless you want to venture out.

CLEANING FEE: 
$20 for up to 6 nights
$50 for 6+ nights 
$100 for 28+ nights 
This has not been added as a nightly fee because all would be a set amount. 
There will be a request thru the resolution center on the 1st day of your stay, based on the length of your stay. 
PET FEE: 
$20 per night for up to 2 “Non- Aggressive” pets less than 20 pounds. 
Not to exceed $200
This fee has not been added as a nightly fee because all would be a set amount. 
There will be a request sent thru the resolution center on the 1st day of your stay, based on the length of your stay. 
If you do not disclose that there are pets, you may be asked to leave or you  will have the option to accept the request for the fee thru the resolution center. 
The number of people that will be in the unit must be disclosed also. There will be linens based on the number of people and the number of nights.

primaryHost/about: I am a widowed father of 3 . I have 2 kids in college 1 in high school.1 have been self employed since 1997.I travel often for work and pleasure.
sectionedDescription/access:
THE PROPERTY HAS 13 ACRES MOSTLY HILLSIDE BUT THERE ARE FLAT WALKING AREAS
POND HAS FISH , JUST CATCH AND RELEASE
NO PETS INSIDE THE HOME
MY BROTHER HAS A RENTAL ACROSS THE STREET IF YOU NEED MORE ROOM FOR LARGER GROUPS  "THE COZY CABIN" MAY BE AVAILABLE.
sectionedDescription/description:
The Cabin is a fully furnished , 3 bedroom home on 13 acres, a pond 2 fire-pits, wildlife. The house has a gas  fireplace, and a fully stocked kitchen, also we provide a gas grill outside on the wrap around porch. The porch has a swing and plenty of seating. A  wash room with full size washer and dryer. The pond has a dock and is fully stocked. A king master suite with a  shower ,bath tub. A bunk room w/ 4 long bunks. Upstairs a balcony / queen bedroom overlooking the downstairs.

THE CABIN HAS 3- BEDROOMS A KING IN THE MASTER AND A QUEEN UPSTAIRS, THE THIRD ROOM IS A BUNK ROOM WITH 4  EXTRA LONG BUNKS (NO RAILS)
THE UPSTAIRS BEDROOM IS OPEN TO THE DOWNSTAIRS WITH A TV AND OUTSIDE BALCONY, LARGE CLOSET AND A LED LIGHTED HEADBOARD
THE MASTER BEDROOM HAS ITS OWN BATH AND SHOWER
THE HOUSE HAS A WRAP AROUND PORCH WITH THE FRONT COVERED AND  PLENTY OF SEATING
THERE IS A COVERED DOCK ON THE POND WITH A CHARCOAL PARK GRILL VERY NICE PLACE TO WATCH THE SUNSET
THERE ARE NO GATES ON THE DECKS OR THE STAIRS
THE CABIN HAS ALL THE  AMENITIES PROVIDED fully stocked kitchen
TOWELS,BEDDING, KUREG AND REGULAR COFFEE POT, OUTDOOR GRILL,  2-FIRE PITS

THE PROPERTY HAS 13 ACRES MOSTLY HILLSIDE BUT THERE ARE FLAT WALKING AREAS
POND HAS FISH , JUST CATCH AND RELEASE
NO PETS INSIDE THE HOME
MY BROTHER HAS A RENTAL ACROSS THE STREET IF YOU NEED MORE ROOM FOR LARGER GROUPS  "THE COZY CABIN" MAY BE AVAILABLE.

MOSTLY I WILL BE AVAILABLE BUT I TRAVEL A LOT.

THIS IS A COUNTRY SETTING BUT NOT FAR FROM RESTAURANTS AND STORES.
You drive to Kenova or Huntington ,WV. Ashland,Ky or Louisa, Ky. in APPROX - 10-15 minutes.
There are 2  Walmart stores 10-15 minutes drive also.

PLENTY OF PARKING BUT THE DRIVEWAY IS GRAVEL AND SOMETIMES GETS MUDDY

MY BROTHER LIVES IN THE LOG HOUSE ACROSS THE STREET IF YOU HAVE A EMERGENCY PROBLEM

sectionedDescription/access:
Enjoy the privacy of an entire two bedroom, one bath apartment that is dedicated solely to guest use. It’s located on the second floor above a furniture store. ***Must climb stairs***

There’s no need to hassle with keys.  All doors have a key code that will be shared upon booking.  The apartment is also secured with a locking exterior door.
sectionedDescription/description:
* If you book for 7 days or more, you will receive a 20% discount off your stay.  

If you’re in town on business, to visit family or just traveling through, this 2ND FLOOR APT is perfect for you.  Enjoy a full kitchen & onsite laundry facility.   You’ll get a good nights sleep in a quiet space, on high quality mattresses. We are conveniently located just down the street from a Food City. We have a work desk & free WIFI. We’re just a 5 minute drive from downtown Pikeville.

Family oriented or perfect for the business traveler!  This apartment is spacious, clean, and conveniently located.

Enjoy the privacy of an entire two bedroom, one bath apartment that is dedicated solely to guest use. It’s located on the second floor above a furniture store. ***Must climb stairs***

There’s no need to hassle with keys.  All doors have a key code that will be shared upon booking.  The apartment is also secured with a locking exterior door.

I am available via email at dreamfurniture@aol.com.

The apartment is conveniently located in the Indian Hills community in Pikeville.  Food City is conveniently located just down the street approximately 0.2 miles, for any necessities you may need. We’re only a 5-7 minute drive from downtown.

Parking is available in the lot to the left or the lot to the right of the building. You can access the apartment on either side of the building. There is a flight of outdoor stairs on each side of the building to access the apartment which is located on the second floor.

There’s no need to hassle with keys.  All doors have a key code that will be shared upon booking.  The apartment is also secured with a locking exterior door.

name: Close to Valley Park w/ large yard for activities!
primaryHost/about: I love the outdoors and prefer being outside any day in any weather, rather than being inside.
sectionedDescription/access: The entire house, driveway, and yard can be used. The garage and 2 barns are off-limits.
sectionedDescription/description:
Relax with the family and unwind at this peaceful "Almost Heaven"ly" place; truly, a piece of "Wild & Wonderful West Virginia".  Sitting on approximately 20 acres, on the edge of town, you’ll find the peaceful countryside with the convenience of being less than 5 minutes from shopping, restaurants, and I-64.

3 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, kitchen, living room, and laundry/mud room. Fully updated and freshly painted quaint little 1250sqft farmhouse.

The entire house, driveway, and yard can be used. The garage and 2 barns are off-limits.

We live in the brown brick house next door (about 75 yards away) and we are almost always there or close by to help with anything you may need during your stay.  Please do not hesitate to contact us.

Countryside across the street from a gated subdivision.  Convenient and peaceful

You’ll need to drive if you’re going someone. No on-street parking.  Use the driveway and parking area.

sectionedDescription/description:
Delightful studio, newer construction and tastefully decorated.  Fully equipped kitchen, gas fireplace and smart TV.  WiFi and cellular service provided.  Bath and bed linens, toiletries on site.  Unit has a dryer, but a washer/dryer is provided in a common space with 2nd bathroom.  Tub/shower combo in this unit.  Has single bed, loveseat, dresser and night table.  1 designated parking space provided.  Patio area with table and grill in common space shared with other units.

24/7 availability

p3SummaryAddress: Saint Albans, West Virginia, United States
primaryHost/about: Bill joined the AirB&B family in 2018 when his daughter thought he might enjoy listing one of his furnished apartments for short-term rental. The two of them had so much fun setting up the space for travelers that he has kept it going. Bill loves traveling and has been to various points around the USA, but nothing compares to his time spent in Uganda, East Africa (though he still claims West Virginia beats all!). He and his wife Cecilia have been married for over 50 years and have three grown children. His oldest daughter Angela rents her Farm House and Barn Loft on Airbnb, his youngest daughter Cara works as a nurse at CAMC, and his son Keith has been a missionary in Uganda. He has 18 grandchildren and0 he welcomes you to visit his Coal River Hideaways!

name: Entire Guesthouse 2 miles or 3 mins from I-64
photos/21/caption:
TRAIL MAP
The blue lines are trails that are open.
Orange and blue are temporarily closed
primaryHost/about:
Hey... I'm Brad.
Huntington has always been my home and I enjoy meeting folks from other places.
I enjoy backpacking, wildlife, fishing, riding mountain bikes, and mostly hiking long distances in the mountains. 
Airbnb is a new venture for me and I love making things nice for the guests and treating them like I like to be treated.  The reviews are a cool reward.☺☺☺
Come on out and enjoy your stay.
Brad
sectionedDescription/access: You will have access to the guesthouse and some hiking trails on the property.
sectionedDescription/description:
Hello,
Our guest house is very private, quiet, cozy, secure and exceptionally clean.   A great couples retreat with 2+miles of hiking trails and a vast space for outdoor activities and wildlife viewing. 
   The beds are comfortable and the heat and air conditioning are great.  We have all the amenities...all linens and beddings are furnished.  There is a washer, dryer, iron and hair dryer and detergent.
We are nestled on over 100 acres of land and are 1000 feet from the nearest highway.

A clean and cozy guesthouse with nice touches of hardwood and hard surfaces. 
  One bedroom has a queen bed and the other has a bunkbed and both include bedding and extra blankets.
  There is a living room with a 4k smart TV, LAN line,  wifi router, Fast internet (119 mbps), and Roku.
  A wooden deck provides a great place to sit outside and relax and entertain.
Very private, safe, and secure.  Absolutely no animals or pets  allowed.

You will have access to the guesthouse and some hiking trails on the property.

I enjoy talking to to the guest but understand the  importance of letting the guest have their space.  I can be contacted by text, phone, or in person.

Our place is only 6 minutes from Cabell Huntington  Hospital and 10 minutes to Marahall University.  We are located just 1.5 miles south of interstate 64 at exit 11 with the comforts of a rural country setting and the convenience of being close to town.  The space is cozy and private.  The property offers hiking trails and wildlife viewing for those wanting to get out in nature.

You'll be best traveling via car in the the Huntington area and a 4 wheel drive when the roads get snowy.

NO ANIMALS- NO SMOKING OR VAPING INSIDE-NO PARTIES-NO DRUGS.  
This is a new listing and it's a new venture for me and my family.    I concider it to be a exceptionally clean place with plenty of privacy and easy access to the interstate and downtown Huntington.

sectionedDescription/description:
This cute and cozy bungalow is close to everything! Nestled in a quiet and safe neighborhood, we are just a few minutes away from Cabell Huntington Hospital, Marshall University,  Ritter Park, and downtown Huntington. We offer clean, comfortable, and convenient lodging and happy to host your furry family members as well. Fenced in backyard and a pet station with some pet supplies are available if needed. No pet deposits or pet fees required, at this time!

Look forward to resting in large comfortable beds. TVs are in the living room and the main bedroom offering Hulu Live TV with Disney Plus and ESPN. The Dollhouse has a very well-equipped kitchen and coffee station with snacks.

There is on-street parking directly in front of the house. There is room for two vehicles, if required. 
Keyless entry into the home via key code that I will provide prior to checking in.

We probably won't interact in person, but I can be there for you if needed.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
* Please wash any dirty dishes you accumulate. 
* Please clean up after your pet inside or outside. 
* No smoking inside the house. We have ash trays on the front porch and on the back patio.
sectionedDescription/interaction: We probably won't interact in person, but I can be there for you if needed.

sectionedDescription/description:
Professionally Managed by Elevation Vacation Rentals.
Hatfield McCoy Trail Riders Welcome!
Looking for a beautiful, mountain-top cabin with an approximate 7-minute ATV ride to the Ivy Branch Trail Head (expected opening March 2021 and is approx. 75 Miles of trails and is located on the Little Coal River), 18 miles to the capital city (Charleston) and 12 miles to Southridge Shopping Center? Outlaw trails galore!  Look no further!
Nestled on a private road on top of the mountain, The Farm offers 75 acres of the mountain to enjoy, outdoor fire pit with 2 picnic tables, indoor woodburning stone fireplace, full bathroom, kitchen with city water, heat/ air conditioning and loft bedroom with 1 queen and 2 full beds.  Plenty of parking for utilities trailers.
The Ivy Branch Trail Head is the most northern trail system of the Hatfield McCoy Trails and is the first system you reach traveling through Charleston.  The Farm is a 7-minute ride on ATVs to the trail head so there is no need to trailer your ATV! The Farm is 7 miles from the Hatfield McCoy Welcome Center as well as Water Ways Park - a family-friendly water park.  The Farm is 12 miles from Southridge Shopping Center which offers a variety of restaurants, shops & entertainment including Cabala's, Hobby Lobby, Wal-Mart, Dick's, Best Buy, Sky Zone trampoline park, Marquee Cinemas,  Southridge Golf Range, South Charleston Memorial Ice Arena, T-Rex Science Center and more!
Seclusion with convenience!

4-wheel drive vehicles highly recommended.
Camping spots are available as an Add-On at check-out on booking process. Prices per night per spot, including car camping.
Campers are permitted with an add-on fee and only with a cabin booking.
Firewood purchases are available when booking.
Additional services are available in the area including Side by Side rentals and guided trails.
Please purchase firewood in advance.  If additional bundles are needed during the stay, please let us know.
Ten days prior to your arrival you will have access to our online Guest Portal. The Guest Portal is your one-stop for all information regarding your stay, including key and WIFI codes, parking instructions, maps and more. 
There is no camping, RVs or any additional guests permitted on the property without prior agreement from Elevation Vacation Rentals. Hunting is not allowed without a prior agreement from Elevation Vacation Rentals and is only available if you are the only guest on the mountain. Violation of this agreement will result in immediate eviction and forfeiture of all money paid.
Please be sure to read our rental agreement prior to check-out.
*Please note - no check-in or check-outs on Saturdays or on Sunday's during a holiday. 
Please let us know if you have any questions.  Thank you!

sectionedDescription/description:
This newly renovated house is located just minutes between the very popular Hatfield McCoy Trail heads for Buffalo Mountain and Devil Anse. The Dollar General grocery store is also located within 1 mile for all of your grocery needs.  This entire house offers 3 bedrooms with 5 beds, full kitchen, living room, washer and dryer, bathroom, fire pit, ping pong table, outdoor grill, and free parking with room for a large trailer.  Additional amenities include WiFi, TV, and a spacious backyard.

You will love staying at our property!  There is plenty of parking on both sides of the house.

We are almost always available by phone or text to help our guests.  We also live right across the street and we live right across the street from the house.  We love interacting with our guests!

Murphy Branch is a wonderful neighborhood.  We have a Dollar General Store approximately 1/2 mile up the road.

Our town is ATV friendly as long as helmets are worn.  There is parking on both sides of the house.

primaryHost/about: Bill joined the AirB&B family in 2018 when his daughter thought he might enjoy listing one of his furnished apartments for short-term rental. The two of them had so much fun setting up the space for travelers that he has kept it going. Bill loves traveling and has been to various points around the USA, but nothing compares to his time spent in Uganda, East Africa (though he still claims West Virginia beats all!). He and his wife Cecilia have been married for over 50 years and have three grown children. His oldest daughter Angela rents her Farm House and Barn Loft on Airbnb, his youngest daughter Cara works as a nurse at CAMC, and his son Keith has been a missionary in Uganda. He has 18 grandchildren and0 he welcomes you to visit his Coal River Hideaways!

sectionedDescription/description:
This apartment is located 20 minutes from Charleston and next to a large residential area with a small fishing lake and streets that are made for walking.  These apartments are safe, with easy access and parking. This unit is ground-level, spacious, and truly one of our best! Perfect for short or long stays. So whether you are coming to enjoy the Coal River or passing through as a traveling nurse or on business, Cara's Coal River Place is a perfect fit for you!

Space has private enterance to a one bedroom apartment with furnished kichen and WiFi

Access the front door to the apartment through doorknob key pad

We want you to know that we’re doing our part to
help our Airbnb guests stay safe by cleaning and
disinfecting frequently touched surfaces (light
switches, doorknobs, cabinet handles, remotes, etc.)
before you check in.

additionalHouseRules:
Must be 23 or older to book unless you contact host for preapproval.  
Absolutely no booking for anyone other than yourself. This is against airbnb policy. 

 No Smoking or vaping. No use of illegal drugs. NO 420. 

Cottage quiet time is from 10pm - 6am. For the comfort of all guests please limit kitchen use, showering (showering when arriving from a late check in or if work hours involve you getting back late is permissible just please be courteous of other guests who are sleeping) and loud noise during these hours. 

Hand wash and put always all used dishes directly after use. No dishes are allowed to remain dirty in the sink overnight. 

The cottage is environmentally friendly and I ask that you try to reuse bath towels. There are hooks for used towels in the bathroom and on the closet door of each room. 
Place used towels and washcloths that need laundered in laundry basket in hall. 

Please use vent fan in bathroom during showers to allow moisture to escape and prevent mildew buildup.

Lower level deck and lower area of the cottage are both off limits to guests. 

No overnight guests permitted. No visiting guests allowed. This can cause a safety issue with other guests since they are not registered.  

$10 fee for lost bedroom key 
$25 fee for ruined  or stained sheets 
$50 fee for ruined or stained  comforter

name: South Hills Cottage Close to Hospitals
photos/6/caption: The cottage was built by a stone mason for he and his wife. He was quite an artistic individual who loved carving stone.
photos/7/caption: The cottage is your own personal tree house. Nestled in the hills of WV but only 2 miles from downtown and major shopping areas.
photos/15/caption: The Senators Room- The largest room in the cottage. Perfect for a busy professional.  Room is complete with a queen size bed, desk, executive chair, side table, 2 lamps, and wireless charging alarm clock.
photos/16/caption:
Room 2. 
This cozy room has a view of the side and back garden. Queen bed with dresser, small desk area and closet. With a ceiling fan, stand fan, and lamp.
photos/18/caption: The Bridge Room- My favorite room in the house. Large double windows provide an amazing view of the scenic bridge and back yard foliage. Hardwood floors, area rug, antique dresser, lamp, closet, desk, i-home charging station, stand fan and closet.
photos/22/caption: Clean refreshing shower always stocked with fluffy soft good smelling towels.
photos/23/caption: Beautiful Elk River located about 20 minutes away great for floating trips and relaxing.
photos/24/caption: The cottage has a new message board!
photos/25/caption: New roll away bed for additional guests. (Maximum of 2 total guests per room.)
photos/29/caption: A full kitchen available for your use. A regular coffee pot, Keurig, toaster, air fryer, refrigerator with filtered water and ice, gas range and oven.
primaryHost/about: Hello. my name is Rebecca. I worked in the medical field for many years and now work for the state of WV and own an Aerial Yoga studio. In my spare time I volunteer for a disaster relief organization and am a certified chainsaw operator.  I have a passion for travel and love the outdoors. My goal for my airbnb is to make everyone feel at home in the "cottage away from home."
sectionedDescription/access: Feel free to use the side porch, lighted deck area and outdoor gas grill during your stay.
sectionedDescription/description:
Cozy South Hills cottage in a premium location in Charleston, WV excellent for medical professionals. Safe & quiet area 1.2m to downtown Charleston Capitol Street area. 2.1m to CAMC General. 4.5m to CAMC Memorial. 3.6m to CAMC Women's & Children's. 7.4m to Thomas Memorial. 4.7m to DOW Chemical. 6.2m to CRW. Private Bedroom, queen bed, dresser, desk, Hardwood floors. Spacious shared kitchen, living room & bathroom. Bedroom with keyed lock. Smoke & Pet Free. Long term stays welcome. 23+ to book

Linens, towels and washcloths are provided. All kitchen utensils are provided.  Gas grill and patio furniture on upper deck available for use. Corn Hole set available for use. 6 inflatable swim tubes free to borrow for float trips down the Elk River. Wifi tv available upon request . Please be aware the common areas (bathroom, kitchen, living room, dining room, and patio) of the cottage are shared between all 3 airbnb rooms and myself.

Feel free to use the side porch, lighted deck area and outdoor gas grill during your stay.

Guests may reach me via text, email or calls. I will be on premises throughout the day if you have any questions.

0.7 - 0.8 mile walk to Bridge Road shops. Including:
Lola's Pizza, 
Bridge Road Bistro,
Bridge Mart and Deli,
Rite Aid, 
Hudson's Pizza

Also a short walk to connect to the Carriage Trail walking trail.

Uber and Lyft available but highly unreliable. Bus transportation not available. Please be sure to have access to a vehicle during your stay as walking to downtown is not possible due to no sidewalks and a curvy road.

Cottage quiet time is from 10pm - 6am. For the comfort of all guests please limit kitchen use and loud noise during these hours. No overnight guests permitted. No smoking or vaping.  No pets due to host allergy.

sectionedDescription/description:
Unwind in the serenity of this beautiful home, situated in the heart of the Appalachian Mountains, where you can gaze at the breathtaking Kanawha River and mountainous backdrop from the comfort of a covered patio. This rental offers access to the river for fishing or kayaking (gear not included). The house is  minutes away from historic Charleston, offering a balance of access to city attractions with a scenic place to rest after adventuring. The house is close to Interstates 64, 77, and 79.

Family-friendly neighborhood. Property is directly across from Dupont Middle School and renters will have a front-porch view of the track and ball field. There is a private river access road on the property. The house is the last house on a dead end street. Parking area is lighted at night.
sectionedDescription/houseRules: Please leave the property as it was upon arrival. Do not leave trash along the river's edge. Additional rules and local information are in the black magazine rack in the living room that has a fireplace.

name: Spacious One Bedroom Located in Welch
priceDetails/0/value: $10 per night after the first guest
primaryHost/about: My wife Elise and I have lived in McDowell County since November 2015. We moved from New England to help the community through outreach and ministry and we've fallen in love with the area and the people here. We love to go for walks, listen to music, travel anywhere & everywhere, and meet new friends.
sectionedDescription/access: Enjoy the scenic mountain view from our quiet and cozy front porch. Park right in front of the residence. The apartment is a two minute walk from downtown Welch.
sectionedDescription/description:
Enjoy our newly remodeled apartment in the heart of historic Welch. This unit was designed with the traveling professional in mind; quiet, easily accessible and comfortable.

Our spacious one bedroom is the perfect getaway for travelers to the area. Whether you are a nurse, teacher, other working professional or are just looking to stay in Welch, this is the place for you. 

We offer optimal Wi-Fi and have a television with a Roku for your viewing pleasure. 

A fully equipped kitchen and pleasant dining room will cater to any culinary needs.

Enjoy the scenic mountain view from our quiet and cozy front porch. Park right in front of the residence. The apartment is a two minute walk from downtown Welch.

There is truly no other place like Welch, WV. Once a booming coal town, Welch now has a much smaller population. Welch and McDowell County have garnered much attention over the past decade. The New York Times and CNN have published and produced different pieces highlighting the county and its unique way of life that still exists here in the mountains. Even the late chef, author, and documentarian, Anthony Bourdain spent time filming in McDowell and was quoted saying it was one of the most unique places he had traveled to.
 https://www.wvpress.org/breaking-news/anthony-bourdain-mcdowell-best-place-earth/

You can see McDowell County's episode on season 11 of Anthony Bourdain: Parts Unknown.

This home is within walking distance to a gas station, a library, town hall and the movie theatre. The Jack Caffrey Arts and Culture Center is a short distance away. Small shops, grocery stores and restaurants are all one to five miles away. There is a Bluefield Area Transit Bus route that runs through town on weekdays.

There are stairs leading up to the house and upon entry, there are stairs leading to the unit.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
Please leave beds unmade.
We prefer no shoes in the apartment.

primaryHost/about: Bill joined the AirB&B family in 2018 when his daughter thought he might enjoy listing one of his furnished apartments for short-term rental. The two of them had so much fun setting up the space for travelers that he has kept it going. Bill loves traveling and has been to various points around the USA, but nothing compares to his time spent in Uganda, East Africa (though he still claims West Virginia beats all!). He and his wife Cecilia have been married for over 50 years and have three grown children. His oldest daughter Angela rents her Farm House and Barn Loft on Airbnb, his youngest daughter Cara works as a nurse at CAMC, and his son Keith has been a missionary in Uganda. He has 18 grandchildren and0 he welcomes you to visit his Coal River Hideaways!

sectionedDescription/description:
Coal River Hideaway Upstairs is a fully-furnished apartment that is conveniently located 16 miles from Charleston and very near to the beautiful Coal River! Guests have access to a full kitchen, clean towels, TV & wireless internet, and a washer and dryer. So whether you are a traveling nurse, have an extended stay with work, are visiting family in the area, or are simply site-seeing around the beautiful state of West Virginia, this is a very safe, relaxing, and affordable place to stay.

We want you to know that we’re doing our part to
help our Airbnb guests stay safe by cleaning and
disinfecting frequently touched surfaces (light
switches, doorknobs, cabinet handles, remotes, etc.)
before you check in.

name: Heavens Porch - Eastern KY Luxury Cabin Rental
photos/0/caption: Private cabin rental at Yatesville Lake State Park boasts some of the most amazing views in all of Kentucky. Heaven's Porch has 2 large bedrooms, 1.5 baths and sleeps up to 7 people. The romantic cabin getaway has a great lake view on 170 acres.
photos/1/caption: One of the things our guest love most about Heaven's Porch is the serenity of the location.  Knestled in the hills, you'll enjoy the lost art of porch time.
photos/2/caption: Private cabin rental at Yatesville Lake State Park boasts some of the most amazing views in all of Kentucky.  Heaven's Porch has 2 large bedrooms, 1.5 baths and sleeps up to 7 people.  The romantic cabin getaway has a seasonal lake view and sits on 170 acres of Appalachian hills.  All that the Smoky Mountains, Pigeon Forge and Gatlinburg would offer in a cabin rental at half the price.
photos/3/caption: Front porch hot tub with amazing views and easy access.  Watch the sunset from the best view Eastern KY has to offer.
photos/4/caption: Enjoy an evening fire as the sunset on your lake view.  With the State of Kentucky owning almost all of the land around the Lake, this is one of the few properties that have a seasonal lake view.  The water is drawn back by the Dam in the winter.
photos/5/caption: Modern Rustic design includes a reclaimed tobacco barn wood Kentucky state, custom made rustic cedar furniture throughout.
photos/6/caption: Authentic leather Dexter Club chair and ottoman from Lazyboy.  Great place to take a nap.

primaryHost/about: The Boggs family is offering their private vacation home nestled in the hills of Eastern Kentucky at Yatesville Lake State Park.  We take great pride in offering a luxurious cabin rental for your vacation, anniversary, golfing, fishing and hiking getaway.  You'll be pleased with your stay, just check out the pictures.
sectionedDescription/access: Guest access to the cabin will be a unique numeric password sent.  Just push the code into the front door to gain access.
sectionedDescription/description:
Welcome to Heavens Porch, a secluded and luxurious private cabin rental by owner at Yatesville Lake State Park in Eastern Kentucky.
Located in a secluded hillside this cabin is perfect for your fishing, golfing, family or just a romantic getaway.

Welcome to Heavens Porch, the sister cabin of Sacred Winds, a secluded and luxurious private cabin rental by owner at Yatesville Lake State Park in Eastern Kentucky. The open cabin feel invites you to sit back and relax away from it all. 

The #1 Cabin Rental in Eastern Kentucky. With over 100 5 Star Reviews, we recently purchased this second cabin for our guests.  Heavens Porch sleeps up to 7 guests and features all high end furniture, appliances and electronics. Sitting on the side of a picturesque mountain top within Yatesville Lake State Park in Louisa, KY, this 1,300 square foot vacation lodge is perfect for your fishing, golfing, family or just romantic getaway vacation. 

This year around vacation home is a popular stay and play at the famous Eagle Ridge Golf Course at Yatesville Lake State Park in Eastern Kentucky. The Heavens Porch cabin is also a favorite for Romantic Getaways, family vacations or a small retreat. 

Amenities include: Indoors - A buckstove propane fireplace, 2 bedrooms and 1.5 bath, custome made Red Cedar Log Queen Bed with Tempur-Pedic mattress, Italian leather sectional and lounging chairs, custom made Red Cedar 6 person bar table and chairs, granite kitchen countertops, custom log island with barstools, stainless steel appliances, upscale washer and dryer, 60 inch Smart 4K HD TV with Youtube Live TV including all network and news channels and Netflix on all tvs, Classic Nintendo game system and of course we have high speed fiber internet access with a wireless router...... and this is only what's on the inside. 

Outdoors: Large 2 story porch with amazing private scenic views, porch swing, rocking chairs, park-like charcoal grill and wicker couch, firepit, over 170 acres of roaming room and the adventures of a life time with Yatesville Lake State Park. This cabin is nestled in a wooded niche on a very secluded hill. 

This luxury cabin will resemble the best that the Smoky Mountains or Hocking Hills has to offer and it's all hear in Eastern Kentucky. * Rates are based on 4 guests. To keep the costs low we do not charge a larger rate for only 4 guests. $15 per additional guests is 40% lower than the average cabin rental. Our cabin is comparable to a $275 a night cabin in the Smoky Mountains.  Cleaning fee of $49 is significantly lower than the $300 average cleaning fee in Pigeon Forge cabin rentals.

What you need to bring: Your own food, shampoos and soap. Food. Walmart is 5 miles away in Louisa just off Route 23. Only 1 hour away from Carter Caves. Non-Smoking, preferably no pets. Things to Do: Golf - Nationally Recognized Eagle Ridge Golf Course. Hiking - Yatesville Lake State Park is home to the infamous Mary Ingels Trail 3.5 Miles. ATV Riding - Eastern Kentucky is famous for back country ATV riding including the famous Hatfield & McCoy trails. This cabin is about an hour from a Trail Head of Hatfield & McCoy. Fishing - Some of the best bass fishing in the country is located 1 mile from this cabin. Fish 26 miles of Yatesville Lake, bring your boat. Horseback Riding at Yatesville Lake State Park. We look forward to sharing our personal retreat cabin with you and your friends and family.

Guest access to the cabin will be a unique numeric password sent.  Just push the code into the front door to gain access.
sectionedDescription/name: Heavens Porch - Eastern KY Luxury Cabin Rental

sectionedDescription/summary:
Welcome to Heavens Porch, a secluded and luxurious private cabin rental by owner at Yatesville Lake State Park in Eastern Kentucky.
Located in a secluded hillside this cabin is perfect for your fishing, golfing, family or just a romantic getaway.

additionalHouseRules:
Quiet time is between 10pm and 7am.
Cabin should be left in a clean manner. Excessively dirty cabins will be subject to additional cleaning fee. 
Please unload and park all atv's on the gravel at all times.
Absolutely no smoking inside cabins. If smoking is suspected you will be subject to a $150 fee to cover cleaning and deodorizing of cabin.
No grilling or cooking of any kind allowed on porches.
No illegal drugs of any kind allowed on property at any time.  allowed
Pets must be registered guests and under 30 lbs. Pets must be on leash at all  times outside. They must go with you on the trails or be crated in the cabin. Guests who leave dogs who bark constantly may be asked to leave with no refund.
Children must remain under adult supervision at all times.
Please place garbage in dumpster and wash your dishes before you leave. Also, please strip your beds linens and place in a pile somewhere in the cabin. Please place all used towels in a pile.
Cancellation Policy: We have a 30 day cancellation policy per cabin. If reservations are cancelled at least 30 days prior to your reservation date then a full refund will be given. If less than 30 days, then there will be no refund of your deposit unless we are able to rent the cabin(s) by the dates you originally reserved.  All cancellations will be charged $50 per cabin regardless of notification date. There will be no refunds for early departure.  If you have any further questions the just let us know.

photos/0/caption: Riverfront cabin with a queen bed in the master, two twins in the loft and a sofa sleeper in the great room. The cabin has vaulted ceilings throughout, full bath, front porch swing, fire ring, and park like charcoal grill.
photos/1/caption: Kitchen offers hickory cabinets and full size stainless sink. All utensils are included as well as pots and pans. There is a coffee maker, microwave, toaster, full size fridge, and a cooktop.
photos/2/caption: The loft space offers two twin size beds with a large window facing the river.
photos/3/caption: The bedroom offers a comfy queen size bed.
primaryHost/about: We have been in the cabin rental business on the Hatfield McCoy Trails since October of 2007. Our guests are always satisfied and are usually return visitors.

sectionedDescription/description:
Wildwood Cabins sits right on the Guyandotte River and the views are amazing and peaceful. We are only 250 yards from trail 17 of the RockhousTrail and only five minutes from the grocery store, restaurants, and gas stations in downtown Gilbert. We can leave trail permits and maps in the cabin for you so there's no need to worry about running those down. Our cabins are very well kept and clean.

We live on property and are available if you need us.

additionalHouseRules:
Additional rules

-Please do not use water hose to wash your machines. The water hose is to be used to spray off muddy clothes only. 

- Please be courteous and remove muddy clothes and boots either outside or in mud room/laundry room. 

-Please do not place muddy clothes in the washer without being sprayed off with water hose first. 

-Please do not use our white bath towels to clean up your machine. 

- Please place all used towels in the hamper located in the bathroom before departure. 

- Guests are responsible to wash all dishes before departure.

- Guests are responsible for making sure the grill is cleaned up after each use. 

-Gather all sheets on beds used and place them in the laundry basket located in the laundry room before departure.

- The house is located in close proximity to wooded areas with wildlife. Please DO NOT feed the Deer or Bears.

-Do not leave any trash or food outside.

- Guests are responsible to clean up any spills and messes they make.

- Place full trash bags in the container outside for pickup.

-No Offroad Vehicles allowed in front yard, on back porch or outside the graveled area.

-If additional parking is needed we have a large parking area about 100 yards from the property for large trailers and trucks. 

- You may not book if you live locally without asking for permission and letting us know why you need a place in town.

- To protect the host and guest, we must verify all guests ahead of the stay. Please be aware: As a part of the verification process, you may be asked to provide a copy of your official government-issued photo ID, confirm your contact information, and pass through our guest portal. The information is collected for screening and verification only and is not stored or used for any other purposes.

- You understand that your check-in instructions will be sent after successfully completing the guest portal.
 
- THERE WILL BE A $500 CHARGE FOR SMOKING, PARTYING, OR BREAKING ANY OTHER HOUSE RULES!
 
- Please do not bring glitter, confetti, etc. to any of our properties.
 
- Please ensure that you review the cancellation policy as it pertains to any cancellation for any COVID-19 reason. We encourage guests to purchase travel insurance because we cannot operate outside of our cancellation policy for any reason.

- Due to our close proximity to wooded areas, we have a large population of insects, including ladybugs, house flies, stink bugs, millipedes, carpenter bees, and wasps. Although all of our properties are sprayed regularly by a professional pest control company, the mountains are not. During various times of the year, these insects may find their way into the property. By booking, you understand that is a possibility during your stay and understand that there will be no refunds related to bugs getting into the property. We will be happy to work with you to get pest control back out if necessary. 

Hillbilly Rentals, LLC’s Vacation Rental Terms and Conditions  (the “Terms”) apply. Renter will receive and agrees to sign the Terms immediately after making reservation, which will include, but not be limited to, the following:
 - The “Minimum Age” to rent the Property is 18 years of age.
 - By booking you agree to provide a copy of a valid government-issued ID directly to us. We will request this after your reservation has been made
 - The Renter is solely responsible for Renter’s actions and the actions of all family members, guests, and invitees.
 - Noise audible outside the Property is prohibited between 11 p.m. and 7 a.m.
 - Unless authorized by the Property Manager, the number of people present at the Property may not exceed the maximum occupancy indicated in the listing or the reservation for the Property.
 - Check-in is 4:00PM and Check-out is before 11:00 AM.
 - If you do not vacate by check-out time, you authorize us to charge a late departure fee of up to one night’s rental and we may remove all Occupants and their personal property from the Property.
 - No smoking is permitted on the inside of the Property at any time. 
 - No animals or pets of any kind are permitted at the Property except bona fide service animals that we are required by law to allow.
 - Renter authorizes us to bill the credit card on file for the full amount of the Rental Fee at the time of booking.  Renter agrees not to make chargeback claims with its credit or debit card issuer.
 - Events and commercial photography or filming are prohibited at the Property without our express written permission.
 - Use of the Property for any criminal activity is prohibited.
 - Neither the Property Manager nor the Owner will be liable for special, incidental, or consequential damages of any kind, including bunk beds on the property.
 - Upon your arrival at the Property, you should inspect the rental unit to ensure the Property condition is to your satisfaction. If you find any conditions you need to report as unsatisfactory or damaged upon your arrival, you should report such conditions within two hours after the time you arrive at the Property. After the two-hour period expires, the Property is provided as is and we are not responsible for the interoperability or unavailability of any amenities.
 - You further agree to give us a reasonable amount of time to respond to your report and to cooperate with our efforts to address the concern or provide a remedy.
 - You acknowledge that you may be required to undergo a background check if mandated by the property management company or the building, as stated in accordance with your rental agreement and condition of the booking.

sectionedDescription/description:
⚡️This home is an absolute must see!⚡️ Fully furnished 5 bedroom 2 bath sleeps 14 people. Very quiet neighborhood, owned and operated by owners of Logan Motorcycle Sales authorized Honda, Yamaha, Polaris and Kawasaki dealer with all your Powersports needs. 💥Located 3 miles from downtown Logan, Bearwallow Trail connector, 10 miles to Devil Anse, Rockhouse, and Buffalo Mountain connectors.💥Ride your machine from the house to everything you would ever need or want.

The home is completely furnished with all brand new furniture and appliances. Fire pit and game room for guests to enjoy.

I will be available during your stay if needed and I can keep in touch through text.

We have a huge gravel parking pad located at the home. However if you need more space for parking we have additional parking located 100 yards from the house that is under surveillance for your piece of mind.

 - You further agree to give us a reasonable amount of time to respond to your report and to cooperate with our efforts to address the concern or provide a remedy.
 - You acknowledge that you may be required to undergo a background check if mandated by the property management company or the building, as stated in accordance with your rental agreement and condition of the booking.

sectionedDescription/description:
Traditional, private suite located just off from the iconic Little Creek Golf Course and Country Club! Nestled in a serene community outside the hustle and bustle of South Charleston, this suite is perfect for singles and couples looking for a sweet getaway or work stay! Great for work stay within a mile of Thomas Memorial Hospital, and located just a few miles from Charleston! All colleges and universities are also very close by. This suite is made to be "Someplace Special!"

Located within walking distance of Little Creek Park, Golf and Country Club! Featuring hiking trails, picnic facilities, pool, golf, tennis courts, and restaurant! Also nearby is the City of South Charleston and Charleston. Other features of the area are Town Center Mall, State Capital, UC College, South Ridge Shopping Centers and much more. 

A South Charleston classic bakery also within a mile (Spring Hill Pastry Shop) you don't want miss it!

Guests have the entire downstairs with the exception of the laundry room.

Available for communication by phone, text, or email.  I do work a lot so I am in and out, however, I always have my phone with me.

My home is located on a very quiet cul-de-sac in a very nice neighborhood. It is a very convenient location, very close to stores and several places to eat as well as things to do.

Please park on the far left side of my driveway.

Please..... absolutely no smoking or drinking of alcoholic beverages. Also, no burning of candles. 

Thank you!

name: Sacred Winds - Yatesville Lake Luxury Cabin Rental
photos/0/caption: Sacred Winds, Kentucky's #1 Rated Private Vacation Rental. Nestled in the hills of Eastern KY is this premium vacation cabin rental.
photos/1/caption: Escape and Explore, find out why families and couples love returning to Sacred Winds.  Yatesville Lake State Park is the hidden gem of Appalachia.
photos/2/caption: Luxury filled private cabin rental at Yatesville Lake State Park in Louisa, KY.
photos/3/caption: Chosen as the highest rated romantic cabin getaway in Kentucky, Sacred Winds has all the amenities the Smoky Mountians offers without the crowds.
photos/4/caption: Over 250 5 Star reviews.  The Boggs Family love sharing their personal vacation home.  How about watching the big game while in the hot tub or with an evening fire?
photos/5/caption: All the amenities you would ever dream of. Netflix and Youtube Live TV.  This rustic modern decor provides the comforts of home with a remote relaxation that will keep you coming back.
photos/6/caption: One of the most talked about highlights is the fully stocked kitchen.  We've left it all behind for you.  We've had a family have Thanksgiving dinner here 3 years in a row.
photos/7/caption: Georgy is our Caribou who watches over Sacred Winds.  The high ceiling A frame cabin has a grand entrance feeling.  Altough its rented everyday, the May Family does a great job of keeping it exceptionally clean.
photos/8/caption: Its a vacation home from one end to the other.  Everything about Sacred Winds is meant to give you the escape your looking for.
photos/9/caption: View from the staircase.  Lots of open room to move around and relax.  You'll love how much natural light flows through the home.
photos/10/caption: Whether its just two of you on a romantic getaway or a family looking to explore, this cabin has all that you're looking for.
photos/11/caption: Comfort matters to choosing the right vacation home.  After a good day of hiking or being on the lake, you have plenty of room to spread out.
photos/12/caption: Welcome to Mom and Dad's vacation.  The upstairs master bedroom houses a custom made king size amish bed.
photos/13/caption: Sacred Winds Chief Bedroom has its own private balcony.  Our guests enjoy early morning coffee as the dew rises off the mountains.
photos/14/caption: An electric fireplace sets the ambiance, while a nice reading rocker is there for that book you've wanted to read.
photos/15/caption: Sacred Winds has all the technology.  This smart tv has Youtube Live TV and Netflix for your evening movies, sports and binge watching shows.
photos/16/caption: Two chairs, because our kids are still asleep downstairs in their own bedroom.
photos/17/caption: Everything the best cabins in Pigeon Forge have, minus the crowds.  Our additional landing invites additional space to move around.
photos/18/caption: Enjoy our custom made arcade table with over 400 vintage arcade games.  Yes its 2 players.  Fun for all ages, including the couple celebrating their 25 year wedding anniversary.
photos/19/caption: Enjoy our arcade table on the open landing.  Fun for all ages.
photos/20/caption: Our custom made day bed sleeps two with a slide out trundle.
photos/21/caption: French glass doors shed natural sunlight into the master bedroom.  Pull the blinds and lock the door for privacy.
photos/22/caption: New in 2021 is a 40" Smart TV on a motion swivel for the bunkbed room.  It has Youtube Live TV and Netflix.  Most of our guests log on with their Apps like Disney+, Hulu and Peacock as well.
photos/23/caption: First floor bedroom with queen size amish made bunkbeds.  Good for kids and adults.  Each bed has a tempur-pedic mattress.
photos/24/caption: Our golfing stay and play groups love having such large beds all to themselves.  Great room for families to put all the kids.
photos/25/caption: Large first floor bathroom with plenty of room.
photos/26/caption: First floor washer and dryer for your use.  Go home with all clean clothes.
photos/27/caption: Wrap around porch with swing.  One of the favorite things mentioned in our 5 star reviews is morning and evening on the porch swing.
photos/28/caption: New in 2020 is the massive covered porch with an outdoor tv and Hot Springs spa.  Bring your relaxation outdoors no matter the weather.
photos/29/caption: Wood campfire with log chairs for your evening fire.  Park-like charcoal grill is in the background.
photos/30/caption: This is where people usually stop looking at the pictures and just book their stay.
photos/31/caption: One our guests favorite things to do is watch tv while being in the hot tub.
photos/32/caption: Early spring photo from one of our guests.
photos/33/caption: Over 3 acres of roaming room.  A few small walking paths to get you warmed up for the State Park hiking.
photos/34/caption: Over 1,700 sq ft of large cabin openness.  4 bar stools at the granite counter and 6 seats at the dining table.
photos/35/caption: Plenty of counter top space makes it comfortable for vacation.  Lots of cabinets to put your food.
photos/36/caption: Looing out over the landing balcony shows the layout of a portion of the living room.
photos/37/caption: Large table seats up to 6.  Fun for board games, cards and story time.
photos/38/caption: Our cabin guests love nature.  Whether its fishing, hiking or simply relaxing, Eastern KY has it all for you.
photos/39/caption: You can find hiking maps from the State Park, the Dam & Marina called the Mary Ingles trail system or find all the virgin trails around the lake.
photos/40/caption: People love trying to find this rock cliff at Yatesville Lake.  A hidden gem and fun to climb and jump.
photos/41/caption: Rent a pontoon boat or bring your own.  Yatesville Lake is a long and adventerous lake.
photos/42/caption: Sunset at one of the beaches at Yatesville Lake.  There is a small beach at the Lawrence County Campground and a beach near the Marina.  You can also look up The Cove at Yatesville Lake for things to do.
photos/43/caption: Eagle's Ridge at Yatesville Lake State Park was ranked as the #3 public course by Golf Digest.
photos/44/caption: Every year we have guests from Canada, Michigan, Wisconsin and New York who stay at Sacred Winds because they love Eagle's Ridge and other nearby Golf Courses.
photos/45/caption: We have several avid kayakers who stay at our family cabin every year.  They say it would take over a week to explore all of Yatesville Lake.  You also have Paintsville, Grayson and East Lynn Lakes nearby.
photos/46/caption: Rush Offroad is only 30 minutes away.  If you're real adventerous you can also enjoy The Hatfield & McCoy trails or drive down to Mine Made Adventure Park.
photos/47/caption: Public hunting land around Yatesville Lake is well known for turkey, squirrel and deer.  You might even run into a small black bear.
photos/48/caption: Yatesville Lake Dam is a great place to explore.  With plenty of roaming room, you can see what the United State Army Corp of Engineers built in 1988.  There is a Welcome facility with maps and information.
photos/49/caption: There is plenty of information online about Yatesville Lake State Park.  You can find hiking maps, information about the mulitple boat ramps, get boat rentals at the Marina (call way in advance).
photos/50/caption: Our guests never get bored.  Eastern KY offers plenty to do without the crowds of the Smoky Mountains.
photos/51/caption: The Boggs Family takes great pride in sharing their private vacation home with guests like you.
primaryHost/about: The Boggs family is offering their private vacation home nestled in the hills of Eastern Kentucky at Yatesville Lake State Park.  We take great pride in offering a luxurious cabin rental for your vacation, anniversary, golfing, fishing and hiking getaway.  You'll be pleased with your stay, just check out the pictures.
sectionedDescription/access: Guest access to the cabin will be a unique numeric password sent.  Just push the code into the front door to gain access.
sectionedDescription/description:
Welcome to Sacred Winds, a secluded and luxurious private cabin rental by owner at Yatesville Lake State Park in Eastern Kentucky.
Located in a secluded hillside this cabin is perfect for your fishing, golfing, family or just a romantic getaway.

Welcome to Sacred Winds, a secluded and luxurious private cabin rental by owner at Yatesville Lake State Park in Eastern Kentucky.  The open cabin feel invites you to sit back and relax away from it all.

The #1 Cabin Rental in Eastern Kentucky. Our personal vacation home is a premium cabin rental that sleeps up to 10 guests and features all high end furniture, appliances and electronics. Sitting on the side of a picturesque mountain top within Yatesville Lake State Park in Louisa, KY, this 2,000 square foot vacation lodge is perfect for your fishing, golfing, family or just romantic getaway vacation.  

This year around vacation home is a popular stay and play at the famous Eagle Ridge Golf Course at Yatesville Lake State Park in Eastern Kentucky.  The Sacred Winds cabin is also a favorite for Romantic Getaways, family vacations or a small retreat.

Sacred Winds Cabin Amenities include:

Indoors - A breath-taking stone electric fireplace, 2 bedrooms and 1 bath, Amish made Cedar Log Queen & Full Bunk Beds with Tempur-Pedic mattresses, Flexsteel leather sectional and executive chair and ottoman, Amish made Cedar dining table and chairs for 8, black granite kitchen countertops and bar with 4 Amish made log barstools, stainless steel appliances, upscale washer and dryer, 60 inch Smart TV with Roku, Netflix and Youtube Live TV, Master Suite king size log bed with balcony, 50 inch HD TV with Netflix and YouTube Live TV, loft area with log daybed and trundle, Mame Arcade System with old arcade and nintendo games, one large full bathroom and a half bath in the master bedroom, and of course we have high speed fiber internet access with a wireless router...... and this is only what's on the inside.  

Outdoors:  Large wrap around porch with rocking chairs, back patio with seating and a wood fire pit, park-like charcoal grill, over 3 acres of roaming room and the adventures of a life time with Yatesville Lake State Park.

This cabin is nestled in a wooded niche on a very secluded hill. This luxury cabin will resemble the best that the Smoky Mountains or Hocking Hills has to offer and it's all hear in Eastern Kentucky.

* Rates are based on 2-4 guests.  To keep the costs low we do not charge a larger rate for only 4 guests.  $15 per additional guests is 40% lower than the average cabin rental.  Our cabin is comparable to a $325 a night cabin in the Smoky Mountains.

What you need to bring:
Your own food, shampoos and soap.  Food.  
Walmart is 5 miles away in Louisa just off Route 23.
Only 1 hour away from Carter Caves.
Bring firewood for outdoor fire pit.
Non-Smoking, preferably no pets.

Things to Do:
Golf - Nationally Recognized Eagle Ridge Golf Course.

Hiking - Yatesville Lake State Park is home to the infamous Mary Ingels Trail 3.5 Miles.

ATV Riding - Eastern Kentucky is famous for back country ATV riding including the famous Hatfield & McCoy trails. This cabin is about an hour from a Trail Head of Hatfield & McCoy.

Fishing - Some of the best bass fishing in the country is located 1 mile from this cabin. Fish 26 miles of Yatesville Lake, bring your boat.

Horseback Riding at Yatesville Lake State Park.

We look forward to sharing our personal retreat cabin with you and your friends and family.

Guest access to the cabin will be a unique numeric password sent.  Just push the code into the front door to gain access.

Your stay will be completely private.  We do have a security system and will only check the recording if something is damaged or we believe there were more guests on the premises than the rental eluded to.

The Ced Gap development is located just 1 mile from the entrance of the Yatesville Lake State Park.  There are neighbors, however most of them only use the cabins as weekend retreats.  This cabin is nestled on a hillside and is private.

Sacred Winds and our Sister Cabin Heaven's Porch are the only 5 Star Cabin Rentals in Eastern Kentucky.  Book with confidence, you will not be disappointed.

name: The Hideaway on Tacketts - Shipping Container
photos/0/caption: Living Area
photos/1/caption: Kitchen
photos/2/caption: Restroom
photos/3/caption: Bedroom
primaryHost/about:
Hello, 
Meeks Rentals and Leasing is located in Hurricane WV. We provide long term and short term rentals up and down the east coast. Feel free to ask us any questions you may have and enjoy your stay with us!
rootAmenitySections/1/subtitle: The host hasn't reported a carbon monoxide detector on the property.
sectionedDescription/access: There are two parking spots available.  Four wheel drive vehicles are not a must, but preferred for easy access to The Hideaway. However, transportation is provided with guests who may be hesitant to drive their vehicle to the top of the hill, where The Hideaway resides.
sectionedDescription/description:
The Hideaway is the perfect getaway for a cozy, private weekend for two! It is nestled in the mountains of Hurricane, WV. It has a serene view of the mountains and a fully stocked pond, ready for fishing. You will have the entire home to yourself, complete with a kitchen, living room, bathroom, and bedroom. On the deck there is a hot tub and a fire pit directly below. You will also have access to Meeks Mountain Trails, so bring your bikes and walking shoes!

Steps inside the front door, a kitchen providing an oven, stove, and fridge will greet you with basic cooking and baking needs. There is also a drip coffee pot available for your morning coffee. Moving to the living room, you will find a sofa and accent chair in front of a large windowed garage door boasting beautiful views of the scenery outside. There is also a 43 inch TV for your viewing pleasure. Moving to the full bathroom, you will find a standing shower where shampoo, conditioner, and body wash will be provided. The bathroom leads to the bedroom, which holds a full size bed and another 43 inch TV. Outdoor seating is available on the deck for four people along with a luxury spa for two to four people. Below the deck, you will find a fire pit with seating for four people as well.

There are two parking spots available.  Four wheel drive vehicles are not a must, but preferred for easy access to The Hideaway. However, transportation is provided with guests who may be hesitant to drive their vehicle to the top of the hill, where The Hideaway resides.

My wife and I live on the property where The HideAway is, so we are always available for anything you may need.

You will be completely secluded with only the mountains and pond in view.  Minutes away, the town of Hurricane awaits with its many restaurants and community activities. If you are visiting us during the summer, paddle boarding is available on the city reservoir through the Appalachian Boarding Company. Hurricane Valley Park is approximately one mile away where you can enjoy a wave pool, baseball field, soccer field, frisbee golf, and dog park. Some of our favorite local restaurants include Whiskey Taco, Baked Craft Wings, Fireside Grille, Belknap Dough Company, and Bridge Cafe and Bistro. Our go-to coffee shop is Drip on Main Street in Hurricane. While you’re there, make sure to swing by Peyton & Peppy Boutique for a new addition to your wardrobe. Lastly, if you’re looking for something sweet, Sweet Mama’s Bakery is the place to go. We are also conveniently located approximately thirty minutes from both cities of Charleston and Huntington where many more restaurants, shopping, and activities await you.

Private parking is available at The Hideaway.

A jon boat will be available to cruise around the fully stocked pond, so make sure to bring your fishing poles! Due to limited cell service, free wifi is provided.
sectionedDescription/interaction: My wife and I live on the property where The HideAway is, so we are always available for anything you may need.
sectionedDescription/name: The Hideaway on Tacketts - Shipping Container
sectionedDescription/neighborhoodOvervie: You will be completely secluded with only the mountains and pond in view.  Minutes away, the town of Hurricane awaits with its many restaurants and community activities. If you are visiting us during the summer, paddle boarding is available on the city reservoir through the Appalachian Boarding Company. Hurricane Valley Park is approximately one mile away where you can enjoy a wave pool, baseball field, soccer field, frisbee golf, and dog park. Some of our favorite local restaurants include Whiskey Taco, Baked Craft Wings, Fireside Grille, Belknap Dough Company, and Bridge Cafe and Bistro. Our go-to coffee shop is Drip on Main Street in Hurricane. While you’re there, make sure to swing by Peyton & Peppy Boutique for a new addition to your wardrobe. Lastly, if you’re looking for something sweet, Sweet Mama’s Bakery is the place to go. We are also conveniently located approximately thirty minutes from both cities of Charleston and Huntington where many more restaurants, shopping, and activities await you.
sectionedDescription/notes: A jon boat will be available to cruise around the fully stocked pond, so make sure to bring your fishing poles! Due to limited cell service, free wifi is provided.
sectionedDescription/space: Steps inside the front door, a kitchen providing an oven, stove, and fridge will greet you with basic cooking and baking needs. There is also a drip coffee pot available for your morning coffee. Moving to the living room, you will find a sofa and accent chair in front of a large windowed garage door boasting beautiful views of the scenery outside. There is also a 43 inch TV for your viewing pleasure. Moving to the full bathroom, you will find a standing shower where shampoo, conditioner, and body wash will be provided. The bathroom leads to the bedroom, which holds a full size bed and another 43 inch TV. Outdoor seating is available on the deck for four people along with a luxury spa for two to four people. Below the deck, you will find a fire pit with seating for four people as well.
sectionedDescription/summary: The Hideaway is the perfect getaway for a cozy, private weekend for two! It is nestled in the mountains of Hurricane, WV. It has a serene view of the mountains and a fully stocked pond, ready for fishing. You will have the entire home to yourself, complete with a kitchen, living room, bathroom, and bedroom. On the deck there is a hot tub and a fire pit directly below. You will also have access to Meeks Mountain Trails, so bring your bikes and walking shoes!
sectionedDescription/transit: Private parking is available at The Hideaway.

additionalHouseRules:
While we love to welcome families with children, please be aware that our home backs up to a river. It takes a lot of effort to go down to the river, but if you’re bringing children please be aware of the dangers that could present themselves. Any danger that could arise from use of fire pits is a risk parents take when building a fire for their family to enjoy. Parents are responsible for the safety of their own children while on our property. 

- Quiet hours between 10:00pm and 6:00am

Check out time is no later than 10:00am. If you'd like a later check out you must let us know 48 hours prior to your arrival. A $10 fee will be assessed for later check out. 

Check in time is 4:00pm or later. If you'd like earlier check-in you must let us know 48 hours prior to your arrival. A $10 fee will be assessed for early check-in.
